1.content: What timeline are you from?
1.title: What timeline

12.content:
"Hey Zack, hurry up or you'll miss your flight!"
"Coming Mom!"

You hastily take one more look into your suitcase. There's your clothes, your toothbrush, some books about duel theory, your laptop - something seems like it's missing... your deck! In a panic, you rush around the room looking for where you've left it.

"Zack!"
"Just a second Mom!"

It had to be here somewhere... frantically you grope every inch of your small, messy room as you try to find it.

"What are you even doing Zack!? Come on!"
"I've lost something, okay mom? I can't find my deck! Why don't you just give me a second!?"

There is a short pause, and then you suddenly hear laughter from the foyer where your mother was waiting. "You left your deck over here at the front door" she calls over "You said that if you put it here then you'll see it on your way out, so you won't forget it."

You facepalm. D'oh! Of course your mother was right. She always was.
"Thanks mom!" you call as you race to the front door, dragging your heavy suitcase behind you.

Your mom didn't move, however. "I can't believe my little Zack is finally all grown up"
You look at her strangely. "Uh - mom, I'm still only fourteen" you point out.
"Being invited to big tournaments all around the globe... already the number one ranked duelist in Australia..."
"Uh - mom?"
"Yes darling?"
"We're in a hurry, remember?"
"Oh - right." Your mom giggles a bit as she opens the door for you "After you"
You begin to leave the house before your mom stops you. "Just don't forget to pick up your deck on your way out" she says.
"Oh yeah" you reply, smiling, as you picked up your deck and made for your family's old car "Thanks mom."

Outside, your best friend Andrew is already waiting for you to say goodbye. "Laters Zack - we'll all miss you around school!"
"Hey, no worries" you say, opening the boot of the car and stuffing your suitcase inside "I'll make sure to call you!"
"Don't forget!" replies Andrew "Oh - but DO forget about Rebekah. You can't let that interfere with your dueling."

You sigh. Andrew was right, though you didn't like to be reminded of how your former girlfriend dumped you. Apparently your obsession with card games was too much for her. But since she left you, you had been finding it hard to concentrate on your game.

"Thanks Andrew" you say as you enter the car "I'll bear that in mind"
"OK, time to go, see you later Andrew!" calls your mom.
"Bye!" calls Andrew in reply.

As the car drives away, you smile and wave at Andrew, who waves back from outside your house.
"It's a pity they only paid for your ticket" says your mom as she drives "It would be awesome to be able to duel with your friends."
"Yeah" you say "But you never know. Maybe I'll meet some new friends at the tournament."
"I'm sure you will honey. By the way, what's this tournament called again? I always get confused with all those events you're always going to..."
12.title: Yu-Gi-Oh

122.content:
"Welcome to battle city" says the announcer as your plane touches down at the airport. All the duelists are travelling first class on the special KaibaCorp jets, so you aren't sitting next to one of your competitors. Of course, this gives you plenty of time to run through your deck a few more times and work out some last-minute strategies.

"As you disembark the aircraft, please show your identification" continues the announcer "And you will be issued with a free official KaibaCorp Duel Disk. Don't forget about the rules of the tournament, including the ante rule and the locator cards system."

"Alright" you say, stretching and getting up out of your seat "I'm ready to duel!"
"Please remain seated until the seatbelt sign has been switched off" added the announcer.
You groan and sit back down.

At last when you get out of the aircraft and step on to the tarmac, you feel a cool breeze hit your face. Then suddenly, you hear a shout: "Hey look, it's Seto Kaiba!"

You don't even know who said it, but immediately you look around and see him wearing his distinctive white coat. There, flanked by his brother Mokuba, was Seto Kaiba embarking on to a helicopter.

"Wow" you say under your breath "Seto Kaiba! Now he'd be a good challenge for my deck."
"Hey, no kidding" said the duelist behind you "Seto's practically unbeatable. Only the likes of Pegasus or Yugi can stand up to him."
"I think I've got a shot" you reply with a smile "It's worth giving it my all! I am the Australian national champion."
"Some attitude you've got there" he said with a sly smirk in response "You remind me a bit of Rebecca Hawkings."

Rebecca. Dammit, you weren't supposed to be thinking of your ex-girlfriend right now. You had to push her out of your mind.

"Hey, I'm a much better duelist than her!" you say a little louder than you should.
"Why don't you prove it?" asked the other duelist "In a few moments we'll all get our duel disks. Then you can put your cards where your mouth is."
"Game on!" you say passionately, turning to your opponent.

The man was about twice your height and had bulky, bulging muscles. He had thick, spiky brown hair and wore a heavy yellow vest and helmet that made him look like a construction worker. "Some outfit you have there" you reply somewhat sarcastically, while a KaibaCorp official strapped a Duel Disk to your arm.
"Some outfit you have" replies the man as another official strapped a Duel Disk to his "How old are you, seven?"
"I'm fourteen!" you sneer.
"Then you're still just a little baby" laughs the man "I am Conner Structer, here to engineer your defeat!"
"Let's duel this!" you cry out. It was something of a catchphrase you had.

Conner jumps up on to the aircraft wing, and you follow suit, standing a good distance away from him. A small crowd of observers, most from your flight, gather around to watch the action as both of you insert your decks into the Duel Disks at the exact same time.

"Your name's Alex, isn't it?" asks Conner "They say you're a national champion."
"That's an understatement" you reply "I'm one of the strongest duelists of my time!"
"Well then let's put that to the test" smirks Conner "And I hope you don't mind if I start the action off?"
"Go ahead" you say as you both draw five cards.

The crowd beneath is already starting to chant your names. For your first duel, this is actually pretty exciting. Conner looks happy with his draw, and quite frankly, you are happy with yours, too. Both of your life points stand at 8000. The duel has begun.

"Right then, here we go!" calls Conner, drawing a card to begin his turn.
"Bring it!" you reply.
"I'll begin with this - the magic card - Heart of the Underdog! With this card, whenever I draw a normal monster at the beginning of my turn, I can draw again!"

"Nice card" you reply "Is that it?"
"You like that card, do you?" asks Conner "Then you'll love this! Because it just so happens that I've drawn a second copy of that card as well! Now whenever I draw a normal monster to begin my turn, I can draw not just one, but two more cards! And thanks to the magic of my Heart of the Underdog, I can keep drawing until the card I draw is not a normal monster!"
"Uh - nice" you answer "I know the card's effect. I've only studied it like, a million times already."
"Then you must know how devastating it can be" smiles Conner "And I've drawn both of the copies in my deck in my opening hand! With this kind of luck on my side, you might as well give up now. You wouldn't want to disappoint this crowd the way you disappointed Rebekah, right?"

How did this guy know so much about your personal life? It's pretty creepy.

"So what kind of engineer are you, anyway?" you ask, thinking of a comeback quickly "Do you just sit around and engineer intimidation like a bully? Or do you really want to see me defeated?"
"I will see you whimpering at my feet!"
"In that case, mate, here's a protip - you don't want me to give up. I'm going to keep fighting this thing! Just watch."

Conner looked annoyed, but not too much. "It's your funeral" he scoffs "You're going down! My deck's full of monsters that combine and build their strengths together!"
"Oh, you mean like a combo!"
"Like THIS! I activate another magic card - Polymerization! With this card I can fuse two monsters in my field or hand together to form an even stronger monster! So I'll use Polymerization to fuse together Blast Juggler and Two-Headed King Rex to construct the ultimate marvel of modern engineering - Cyber Saurus! Come forth, Cyber Saurus, in attack mode."

"Wow" you reply "These holograms are pretty cool!"
"Just watch until they break down your life point by point! Cyber Saurus has 1800 attack points!"
"That's nice. Is it my turn yet?"
"Not quite. I'll set this one card face down in my magic and trap card zone, and then end my turn. Watch out little boy. I think you're in way over your head."

"We'll see about that!" you say as you draw your card.

Which deck were you using?
122.title: Battle City

1221.content:
"Alright, here goes" you call out "I'll begin by playing The Creator Incarnate!"
"Zack! Zack! Zack!" chants the crowd below. Conner looked a little taken aback.
"Now my Creator Incarnate is a pretty powerful monster on its own, with 1600 attack points, but the Creator Incarnate has a special ability too! Observe! First, I tribute my monster to the graveyard, and in its place, I summon The Creator from my hand!"

The mighty red hologram of the creator flashes down from the sky, causing the entire aircraft you are standing on to shake.

"Behold the most powerful monster in my deck!" you gloat "The Creator! With 2300 attack points!"
Conner is quite positively shaking at this point.
"You like that, do you?" you say, mocking his tone "Well then you'll love this! Behold, my Creator's special ability! All I have to do is send one card from my hand to the graveyard, and then I can special summon another card from my graveyard. So I'll begin by discarding this Magician of Faith, to summon The Creator Incarnate back to the field! And now I think I'll use The Creator Incarnate's special ability to summon a second The Creator from my hand!"
"TWO creators!?" cries Conner incredulously.
"That's right!" you exclaim "And between them, they form a way better team than any of the monsters in your deck!"
"We'll see about that!" calls out Conner "Hurry up and make your attack!"

"Actually, I'm far from finished" you say "Next I summon Soul of Purity and Light!"
"You can't!" calls out Conner immediately "You've already summoned The Creator Incarnate this turn!"
"Yes but like my The Creator cards, this is a special summon. All I have to do is remove two light monsters in my graveyard from play - and since my graveyard consists of exactly two light monsters, that shouldn't really be a problem. Now come forth, Soul of Purity and Light!"

Between them, you're pretty happy with how your three monsters dwarf Conner's poor Cyber Saurus.
"This can't be happening!" calls out Conner "How on earth did you summon three powerful monsters with awesome effects and over 2000 attack points, all on your first turn!?"
"I told you" you reply casually "I'm one of the best duelists of my time. But my turn isn't done yet."
"What!" shouts Conner, looking stunned.
"I've still got one card left in my hand, mate. And I'm sure you'd like to know what it is, right?"
"Actually, I think I'd rather not."
"Oh, but I think you would. It's my favorite field spell card - Luminous Spark!"

As soon as your card touched the Duel Disk, the entire wing erupted with a bright light, reflecting and amplifying the light all your monsters were giving off.

"This card raises the attack power of each of my monsters by 500 points. So that means my Creators go up to 2800 attack points each, and my Soul of Purity and Light goes up to 2500 attack points!"
"This can't be happening!"
"Oh yeah. It totally can. And now it's time for my attack! Go, Soul of Purity and Light! Destroy his Cyber Saurus!"

"Hold on!" interjects Conner "You really thought you had me there, didn't you? Did you forget about my trap card?! I activate - Mirror Force!"
There is a huge gasp as the massive amounts of light all around the wing are reflected off at all angles. Pilots around the airport lose their vision in a inferno of light that now seems to surround the whole airport.
"Mirror force!" presses Conner "Reflect the power of his attack right back at Zack and destroy all his monsters!"

"NO!" you scream as the light clears, and all your powerful monsters are gone.
"It's all over!" laughs Conner "You have no cards in your hand! All your monsters are discarded to the graveyard. All you have left is that Luminous Spark, but you have no monsters for it to power up. And now, there is literally nothing more you can do other than end your turn!"
"Hey - I'm not giving up that easily! Make your move!"
"With pleasure!"

Conner draws his card and grins menacingly. "It's all over for you now. Not only is my Cyber Saurus the only monster still on the field, but I just drew a normal monster, Two-Headed King Rex! Now, thanks to my two copies of Heart of the Underdog, I can draw another two cards from my deck!"

Conner draws two more cards. "You're in luck, Zack" he says "Both magic cards. But of course, that doesn't make things any better for you! I activate Fusion Recovery! This card lets me return a monster used for a fusion summon, as well as the card Polymerization, back to my hand. So return to me, Polymerization and Blast Juggler!"

No sooner had he said it than his Duel Disk returned both cards from the slot used for the graveyard. "And I think you know what happens next" he continues "I activate my Polymerization card, fusing the Blast Juggler I just recycled with the Two Headed King Rex I just drew to summon a second Cyber Saurus from my fusion deck!"

The crowd gasps as a second Cyber Saurus appears at Conner's side. "And remember what I was saying earlier about my monsters all supporting each other? Well you're about to see that happen. I activate United We Stand on one of my Cyber Sauruses!"
"An equip spell!"
"That's right Zack! United We Stand increases the attack strength of my Cyber Saurus by 800 points for each monster I control. Since I have two Cyber Sauruses on my side of the field, that means my monster is 1600 points stronger, for a grand total of 3400 attack points!"

"Wow!" says one bystander as he watches the attack strength of the Cyber Saurus grow.
"That's stronger than a Blue Eyes White Dragon!" remarks another.

"And all that is going to be transferred straight to your life points, Zack!" sneers Conner "You still think you're one of the greatest duelists of our time."
"If I come back from this" you smile "I probably am."
"But you won't come back from this! How can you? There's barely a monster in the game that can stand up to my powerful monsters! And you said yourself that your deck doesn't contain anything more powerful than The Creator! Look at you right now - totally defenseless!"
"I trust my deck" you say "And unlike you, I believe in my potential. I will admit, you're clearly quite the expert, Conner. But this duel is not over yet!"
"We'll see about that!" snaps Conner "Go, my Cyber Sauruses! Attack Zack's life points for 5,200 points of damage!"
"Argh!" you scream as the sheer force of the attack throws you backwards, and your life points fell from 8000 to 2800.

"Now go ahead and draw your last pathetic card" laughed Conner "There's no card that can stop me now!"
"We'll see about that! In fact, I'm pretty sure I can turn this duel around completely in this move" you call, rubbing your head which was hit from your fall about Conner's big attack "I draw!"
1221.title: Deck 1

choices: Talk to some of the fans
12211.content:
"It's hopeless!" laughs Conner "And if I'm not mistaken, your Creator has another special ability, preventing you from special summoning it from the graveyard! So there's absolutely no way you'll ever be able to get him back. Your show was great while it lasted, Zack, but now it's all over. Just like it's all over between you and Rebekah."

Why does he keep going on about that?

"I won't be needing to summon my Creator for the rest of the duel. Just watch. It's my move, Conner" you say confidently "And I've drawn my Pot of Greed! This allows me to draw two cards from my deck!"
Conner scoffs. "Yeah, whatever. Get it over with. You seem to be good at that."
"I'm not going to be distracted that easily, Conner. I have complete faith in my deck! Just you watch. I summon my Herald of Creation! With the help of my Luminous Spark field spell card, my Herald of Creation has 2300 awesome attack points!"
"It's still nothing compared to the power of my Cyber Saurus! Cyber Saurus has over a thousand attack points more than your measly Herald of Creation."

"As may be, but as you might have guessed, my Herald has a special ability. By discarding one card from my hand, I can add any one level 7 or higher monster from my graveyard to my hand. Which means my Soul of Purity and Light is back in my hand!"
"What? Why aren't you bringing back your Creator?"
"I told you, I won't be needing it to win. But it gets worse. The card I just discarded to bring my Soul of Purity and Light back to my hand was The Fabled Catsith! When The Fabled Catsith is discarded from my hand to the graveyard, it can destroy any monster on the field! And I think you know which one I'm going to pick!"

"Oh no!" is all Conner can say as his Cyber Saurus is demolished, along with the United We Stand that is attached to it.
"Now I remove The Fabled Catsith and one of my Creators in my graveyard from play" you announce "To summon the Soul of Purity and Light to the field!"
Once again the angelic figure came down with all its 2500 attack points, giving a spectacular light show to the crowds below.
"This is not good!" Conner remarks.
"Now watch this, Conner! Go, Soul of Purity and Light! Destroy his weaker Cyber Saurus and deal 700 points to damage to his life points! And Herald of Creation! Deal 2300 points of damage to his life points directly, for a grand total of 3000 points of damage!"

"No!" cries out Conner as his life points drop to 5000.
"See, I told you I'd turn things around in my move. Now look who's standing defenseless before my monsters, eh? And you've got nothing more in your hand either!"
"That's exactly what my Heart of the Underdog magic cards are for!"
"Well go on then, Conner! Draw your card, and let's see what it is!"

Reluctantly, Conner turns over his card. "Well, would you look at that. It's the same card that you drew - Pot of Greed. Now I can draw another two cards from my deck."
"That's not a problem. Since it's outside of your draw phase, your Heart of the Underdog cards won't activate even if you draw a normal monster. So go ahead! Draw your cards!"
"That doesn't matter to me!" says Conner full of annoyance as he draws his two cards "I set one card face down and end my turn."

"Alright then" you say "It's my turn! I draw! And look what we have here!"
"What! What is it!?"
"It's another one of my favorite magic cards - Change of Heart! This allows me to take control of your monster until the end of your turn!"

A sudden silence fills the crowd. Conner seems to be just barely standing. "This can't be!" he exclaims "This can't be! It simply can't be happening! No!"
"I flip your monster face up - Mashmallon? Interesting. That would have hurt my life points quite a bit if I'd attacked it."
"You're cheating! You have to be cheating!"
"Nope" you flash a smile "I'm just better than you. Go, Soul of Purity and Light! Deal 2500 points of damage directly to his life points!"
"ARGH!" screams Conner as his life points halve.
"Now it's your turn, Herald of Creation! Attack!"
Once again Conner's anguished screams fill the air.
"And now for the grand finale - Conner's marshmallon! Attack Conner directly and wipe out his remaining life points!"
"NO!" squeals Conner as he falls to his knees, and his life points drop to zero.

Once again, the crowds below have taken to chanting your name over and over again. "Zack! Zack! Zack!" they say.

"No! This isn't right! I was meant to win!" wailed Conner.
"Well, I'm sorry, but you didn't. So... um... I think I get your strongest card and locator card, now, right?"
"NO WAY!" screams Conner, as he throws his entire duel disk, with the locator card and his deck in it, into the airplane engine.
"What are you doing?!"
"What does it look like I'm doing, idiot? I'd rather see my cards destroyed than let any of them get into your hands!"

"Hey!" says an official, running over "That's against the official rules!"
"So what?" asks Conner "You going to have me arrested for destroying my own property? You should know I don't have any respect for my cards or this game!"
"No" replies the official "We'll have you arrested for vandalizing that aircraft engine. That's KaibaCorp property."

As the official climbs on to the wing, however, Conner jumps off and runs away down the tarmac. "Stop him!" yells the official.

133.content:
Adam saw another Ra yellow down by lake. He knew the Ra Yellow very well. Her name was Sarah Marie Kaiba. She was the great-granddaughter of Seto Kaiba, and was kinda mad about the teachers not bumping her up to Obelisk Blue, a vision both of us shared. She was skipping rocks and looking at her cards. She held her great-grandfather's Blue Eyes White Dragons, there were now many of them, but not alot of people used them. I was probobly the only other person than Sarah to use the Blue Eyes White Dragon. I had only two while she had all three and his deck. I looked up to the Kaiba Family and treated each one I met with Respect. My family had some close ties to Kaiba Corp, my father was on the board, surprising he didn't lose his job after the kidnapping done by Pegasus. But I knew that Sarah was troubled and I wanted to check on her. I came over closer to her, but she still didn't look at me. I came over a little closer to her again, no response, but then a third time, She responded.

(Note: I want to give credit to Spindleshanks for the creation of Sarah Kaiba and for her creativity, I recommend checking her out here. Here's the Link: http://www.Writing.Com/main/portfolio/vi... )
133.title: Another Ra Yellow was there

1331.content:
Sarah knew it was me checking on her and asked me, "What are you doing" I was kinda surprised to know that she knew. it was me, but I answered back. "Your not the only one bummed out by exams, Sarah. I didn't get move up either. I thought for sure you would after all that practice we did together." She had a small smile but it vanished just as quickly as it appeared. "Well, at least we didn't go down to Slifer Red." She said looking at the bright side. Then I smiled, "That's also true. They have it the hardest, but I keeping our promise about us going to Obelisk together.

Back when we were first came to Duel Academy, We weren't as good as friends until Chazz and some of the Obelisk Boyswere making fun of her and slandering her great-grandfather's name. I was probobly the first to stand up to the three top Obelisk boys. I dueled Chazz and came out the victor. After the duel, His buddies tried to attack me, but that didn't well for them. They ended on the ground and I had a black eye from it after Chazz cheap shot me and ran off. I didn't get in trouble, but Dr. Crowler has a closer eye on me than Jaden. But Sarah thanked me for protecting her. A few weeks later, first exams came up and I came close, but wasn't moved up. But Sarah, though, could of if she wanted to, but choose to stay in Ra Yellow, for our friendship meant something much greater, so we made a promise, that we would go together to Obelisk Blue or stay together, no matter what.

Sarah then spoke, "Yea, but they'll learn." I smiled and hugged her to help her feel better. Sarah just smiled and hugged back and got up. "We better get back in bed before we get caught." I nodded and walked back to the dorm with her and led her to her room, hugged her and said good night. She walked into her bedroom and after saying Night, closed the door. I walked to my room a few doors down and walked in and layed down on my bed, thinking about tomorrow and what new adventures and duels would happen and finally went to sleep.
1331.title: She asks, What are you doing?

13311.content:
In the Morning, I woke from my slumber of dueling and saw my spirit next to me. His card name is Decoy Dragon. He is a small light blue dragon with tiny fangs, to me, he reminded me of Sarah's and my own Blue Eyes White Dragons. He woke me and showed me a smile. I smiled back at my dragon and got out of my bed and went over to my desk where my deck and my PDA was. I picked up my deck and saw my Mix of Dragons and many other creatures and then placed the deck in my side deck pocket. Then I picked up my PDA and saw I had a few messages. One from Jaden, who always checked on me and always wanted to duel me. One from Alexis, who tells me if she needs help with anything when Jaden's busy or if one of the Obelisk Girls start to have a crush on me. But last one surprised me, Sarah sent me a message after I walked her back to her room last night. I didn't hear my PDA beep since I sometimes forget its on vibrate. I clicked her message and read what she sent.

"Adam, I want to thank you for checking on me last night. I'm glad I have such a good friend like you. :) "

I smiled at her message and sent a reply. "Welcome Sarah. What are friends for?" I then placed my PDA back on the desk and left the other messages for later when I have time today. I got out of the blue pajamas they gave us and back into my Ra Yellow Uniform. I was still a first year, though it's been one semester since I came here. I walked out of my room and walked to the Dining Hall, I saw Brier, eating alone. I got my breakfast and sat next to him and spoke, "Hey Brier, how have you been?"

141.content:
My name is Sarah Marie Kaiba.
I am the top duelist in the world, Just ask anyone. I have defeated the 'best' duelists that have come to duel me, and a now working on the rest of them. Though I don't duel very often any more because I am pretty busy running my family's company, in case you didn't guess Kaiba Corp., and also raising my little brother mark. Our parents dissapeared when I was twelve and mark was five, none of our relatives wanted us, well none that we knew of, and so we were placed into an orphange, but what I could never sort out was that there were at least ten different orphanges in New Domino city and yet we get sent to one in the Satalite.

I have my ideas on that one but I've never been one to poke the sleeping dragon. I hated the satalite, absolutely hated it. the people were nice enough but it was not the place i wanted my little brother to grow up in,that being the case I set about planning our escape.
Now I coudn't rely on my grandfather's luck of having some rich socialite coporate head coming to the satalite to make nice with us 'mere mortals', but I could rely on my wits to help me get what I needed. and at the moment that was a computer with wifi.
The dolts in New Domino made a mistake by sending me there, after all the people of the satalite reuse the trash that we send to them, don't they? and since I inhereited more than my grandfathers good looks and his duel deck I was able to put to gether a computer and get it running with almost no problem.

After building my computer I started doing two things, the first was locating my godfather, and the second was buying back Kaiba corp, which as I had leaned with in days of my arrival had been bought out by Rex Goodwin. I was furious for days after hearing that. besides Martha, the woman who became all but a mother to me and mark, there were only two people who dared to go near me durring those ill tempered days. Jack Atlas and Yusie Fudo, granted I didn't much care for company and Jack stopped trying after the first two days, yusie hung in there and tried everything he could to cheer me up at least a little bit.
I had learned to distance myself from people by then, so he didn't get very far, but it was the thought that counted.
But back to the here and now, I had bought back my family's company, and after some digging had found my godfather, who was thankfully more than willing to take us in. Of course our godfather, who by some twisted since of irony was also an uncle of ours, would have taken in the whole world, but that's a moto for you. More kindess than smarts.
Moto? you ask? Yeah there's one more thing I need to tell you my uncle is Jackson Moto. the grandson of the king of games. My dad who was Seto Kaiba's son had married my mom (Well Duh!) who was our uncle jack's sister. Why he didn't step up before is unclear but his story, and I'm willing to believe it, is that he was told that we had vanished with our parents. Leave it to goodwin to twist the facts just enough to suit his needs.

I took back control of my company and began running it myself, talk about history repaeting itself huh? But I could only do that if I kept up my grades in school, according to my uncle Jack. It seemed fair after all I put together a computer made from scraps and it worked, so what was a little school? But it's now five years later, I'm seventeen and my sweet, adorable little brother is twelve, and I'm the full time C.E.O of Kaiba Corp. Goodwin had not been pleased when I took back control, and was even less pleased when I shut down the EnerD progect to repurpose my company (Again!) back to what it was origonally, a gaming company. But I was the owner along with my little brother, so what did I care that Goodwin was ticked? As it turns out I should have cared, a lot.
because my story doesn't begin in New Domino, ( know I could have said that sooner right?) no my story begins in the Satalite. I had been abducted (Agian!)
This seems to be an on going theme for my family. I don't remember how I got there, but i do know that what ever moron thought to bring me back here was dumb enough to let me keep my cards and dueldisk. I check my deck looking for three cards in particular, My grandfather's blue eyes white dragons.
'Well I'll be able to get some duel practice at least.' I thought as I started to look around. the place was even worse than I remembered it being. everything was so....delapadated. I heard a motor running something coming towards me. Something fast!
I moved out of the way and tried to hide, but...

"You there!"

Crap.

I stepped out of the alley, "Can I help you officer?"

"What are you doing out here it's passed curfe-Sarah Kaiba!"

"Yeah don't go shouting it to the heavens you great lout." I said irritablely

"Sorry Miss Kaiba," the officer said, "Is there something I can do for you?"

"Yeah get me a cell phone." I replied, getting out of there would take a little time, so I had to wait and plan, but I could call Mark and make sure that hew as ok.
He handed me his cell phone, I pulled the back off quickly and removed a bugg in the phone, and then called mark.
After making sure my little brother was all right and that uncle jack would keep him out of sight until i got back I tossed the phone back to the officer. I was about to ask where I could get a decent nights sleep when he darted off after a kid riding a red duelrunner.
"Yusie Fudo!" he yelled, "Surrender now!"

"Here for another duel trudge? he taunted.

"You got lucky the last time."

Trudge huh?
Wait
Did he say?
I took off after the two of them. I remembered the satalite like the back of my hand, well the alleys any how.
When I caught up with them I saw them mid duel, Yusie was fantastic! I hadn't seen a duelist like him ever, he reminded me of my grandfather seto almost but also my grandfather Yugi. Well what I imagined they'ed be like any way. trudge lost the duel miserabley. I called out to Yusie just before he could speed off, when he looked at me he looked like he'd seen a ghost.
I guess you never do forget some people. I sure never forgot him.
"S-Sarah?" he finally managed to ask, "is that you?"

"In the living." I replied as I stepped out of the shadows.

"I guess the Alley Cat came back."

"For a time." I replied with a smile, "Still being a junkyard dog?"

"You know it."

14231212.content:
My name is Sylene Truesdale. Yes, I said it right, I am a relative of Syrus and Zane Truesdale. I consider myself lucky for being related to them, but sadly that is all the luck I ever have in life. Technically speaking Syrus would be my great-great-great grandfather. And as such, his deck and cards have been passed down through each generation. Though, my father never really used them. My brother was against it too, so I took them instead. I did not know why they were neglected, I loved all of the cute monsters. However, I soon learned why.

Let me start from the beginning, I was born in Neo Domino City. I was born after the whole Satellite incident. In school, I loved my cards and often took them everywhere I went. I attended Duel Academy and loved battling. However, things weren't always right. My deck, as others and I sometimes say, is obsolete. Fusion monsters do not play a big role in Duel Monsters anymore, and Synchro Monsters were more famous. My deck was always beaten, taunted, and I myself was forced into the taunting. Some of the friends I had and even my brother gave me a new deck to use, but I did not want to change my deck completely. If my distant grandfather could use his deck and win, then I could too. Problem is, I've been having a hard time using it.

One day, I was invited by Akiza to show me her friend's garage. Akiza became one of my first friends, seeing how she knew exactly how I felt being picked on. I wore my blue uniform nicely, since I had no idea how to dress around those guys. "Are you sure Akiza?" I asked her as we walked. "I mean, I thank you for inviting me but, I don't think I should come." I brushed my gray hair nervously, and adjusted my glasses.

"Sylene..." Akiza spoke calmly, "Its alright. My friends will not judge you from your deck. You're good, you just need to see it for yourself."

I smiled, knowing that Akiza really was trying to help me. Luckily the garage was not much farther now.

Thanks." Akiza was surprised that Yusei was out, but he was trying to fix the duel runner of his earlier, so she wasn't mad.

Sylene took a breath and was kinda glad that Yusei yet, but was nervous that someone Akiza didn't know well was coming, little did they know, the guy was closer than they thought.

"Hey Yusei, are you here?" The voice rang from the entrance of the garage. Both Akiza and Sylene saw this guy enter the shop, as Akiza spoke, "In here."

The guy was about Sylene's age, also in Duel Academy uniform. He had brown, short, spiked hair and blue eyes. Sylene didn't know him and he didn't know her, but somehow the guy knew Akiza and said, "Hello Akiza, Did Yusei leave a note for me on where to put the package?" Akiza spoke, "Yea, Yusei said to put it near his toolbox." The guy spoke, "Thank you, Akiza." He goes over to the toolbox and places the box near it and sits down in a nearby chair and waits for Yusei to come back.

Azika kept silent to herself and knew Adam wouldn't be the first to open up to a new girl, knowimg thst it took him almost a week to get him to actually speak to her, but she felt like that Adam could be the friend Sylene needed to help her confidence and be a little more open..
1423121212.title: Sylene says in her comfort zone and is quiet ti...

142312122.content:
The garage was empty at first glance, and I almost left the place entirely. However, we both heard the sound of an engine running inside. Much to my displeasure, we both entered. Yusei himself was on his runner, jacket off and a bit of grease on his cheek. His eyes turned, facing us. I couldn't help but to blush. I knew of Akiza's feelings towards Yusei, but that did not mean he wasn't hot. He stopped his runner and approached us, cleaning off his cheek in the process. "Hey Akiza, who's your friend?"

She smiled, "Yusei, I would like you to meet Sylene Truesdale. She's a fellow student and friend of mine."

I bowed, but my nervousness could obviously be seen. "P-Pleased to meet you!"

Yusei gave me a warm smile, which did not handle well with my nervous behavior or my red face. Akiza approached him, "Yusei, I need to speak with you on something...Sylene don't go anywhere." I tried to stop blushing, even if that was impossible. Despite Akiza being my friend, I was scared of her. I mean, the whole "Black Rose" incident really did not play well on anyone. But, I am still her friend. Her and Yusei went off to another area, so I took the time to look around.

That was another thing I never really got into is Turbo Dueling. I mean, I did own a scooter that could go really fast, but I never decided to Turbo Duel. I never understood Speed Spells, mainly because I did not know of a single one that could help me out, being a Fusion deck and all. But one thing I did know pretty well was machines, and Yusei's was very well built. I just wish I could take a look inside.

"Sylene..." Yusei's tone startled me, so I accidentally fell back in surprise. He put his hand out, "Sorry, I never meant to startle you."

I blushed as I was helped up, "Uh, oh, it's...it's fine..."

"Now, as I was saying, I heard you were having trouble with your deck." I was completely shocked, how did he know about that? Though, the serious look on Akiza's face automatically answered it for me. "Akiza told me of the several duelists at your school taunt your deck."

I could not help but to look sad, could you blame me? "Well...yeah..." I held my deck out to show him, "It's a passed down deck from generation to generation of my family. I...I was the only one in this generation that actually wanted it."

I watched as he shuffled through my cards. "That's weird...some of these are a bit different..."

"Oh, right, you see some of my friends and family members gave me a few cards to help me out. Plus there is a few childhood cards in there too. I...I couldn't help but to mix them in."

He handed me my deck, "Well, you have a pretty good deck. I think you could do well."

"That makes one of us..." I sighed, but soon found that I had a hand on my shoulder. My blushed deepened as soon as I saw it was Yusei.

"Listen, over the past couple of months, a lot has happened. But I do know that no deck is worthless, as long as you have the right faith." Yusei gave me a smile, "So that is why I would like to duel you."

I stepped back in surprise, not expecting that at all. "D-D-Duel me? B-But...m-my deck..."

"Has potential, as long as you believe it can. So what do you say Sylene? Care for a friendly duel?" Both he and Akiza gave a nice smile. But dueling Yusei would be like a newbie taking on a world renowned champion, and that is exactly how this duel will be like! But, he said my deck has potential. He has been known to get out of tight spots before, but should I or should I not duel him.
142312122.title: Meeting for a Confidence Boost

choices: Sylene takes his hand; she accepts
She's too upset, she runs and leaves her deck behind.
1423121221.content:
(Sorry about this note, but I decided to change to 3rd person instead of 1st. Also, I do not know how to type a duel properly.)

Sylene nodded gently, "Uh...okay...maybe a small duel wouldn't hurt." She rummaged through her backpack for her duel disk as Yusei went to retrieve his. His runner set it out easily before placing it on his arm. Sylene placed her deck in the holder and it was instantly shuffled. Both duelists stepped out of the garage and onto the area before it to duel. Each of their disks activated, illuminating the disks with energy. "Let's duel!" And with that, the match started.

"Uh...I-I'll go first..." Sylene spoke as she drew. It could be easily seen that she was nervous; her hands were shaking as she looked at her draw. "uh...I-I summon Truckroid in Attack mode." Truckroid ATK: 1000 Upon summoning it, Sylene seemed to calm down a bit. "I end my turn with a face down."

Yusei looked to her, "Not a bad first move, but let's see if I can do better." He drew his card and looked to his hand. "I summon Speed Warrior in Attack Mode!" One of Yusei's signature cards, summoned on the first turn, posed for battle. Speed Warrior ATK: 900 "And now, his special ability activates. On the turn he is summoned, his attack points double. So now with that power boost, Speed Warrior will attack Truckroid!"

"Wait, 1800 attack points?!" Sylene asked in shock. However, before she could proper get her answer, Speed Warrior charged and destroyed Truckroid, along with her losing 800 Life Points.

"I place a card face down and end my turn." Yusei looked up to her, "Its your move."

Sylene broke out of her state of shock, "Oh...right..." She drew her card. She looked at all of her cards in nervousness, trying to even think of a way to win. Then, her face cracked a smile. "Oh yeah! I think I might actually have something here!" That stated, Yusei and Akiza smiled. "First I'm activating my trap card, Call of the Haunted! That allows me to summon a monster that was destroyed by battle, so Truckroid is coming back!" Her card flipped up, and soon Truckroid drove straight out of it. "Next, I'm playing Polymerization!" A fusion vortex soon formed behind her. "With Ploymerization, I can fuse two or monsters as long as they're on my field or in my hand. So I'm fusing together Ambulanceroid and Rescueroid!" Upon mentioning of their names, the two monster appeared on the field. But then, they were both lifted and sucked into the vortex. "I now summon, Ambulance Rescueroid!" The giant red vehicle came smashing out, sirens ablaze. Ambulance Rescueroid ATK: 2300

Yusei smiled, "Its seems your confidence is up."

"Yeah, well how about this?! My Truckroid will attack Speed Warrior!" Her monster revved forward straight towards him. "Oh, and guess what? When Truckroid destroys a monster, its instead equipped to him. So which means my Truckroid will soon gain a boost."

"Sorry Sylene, but its not that easy." Sylene looked shocked. "I activate the trap card Scrap Iron Scarecrow!" His trap flipped up, and soon a rusty imitation scarecrow stood in the way. Truckroid crashed against it and skidded back to his side. "Now, because of this card it can be set back down. However, I can only use it once."

Sylene smiled a bit, "Then that means I can still destroy him! Ambulance Rescueroid, attack!" Sirens blaring, her monster charged, slamming into Yusei's Speed Warrior and destroying it. Soon Yusei's life points dropped to 2600. "I...I landed a hit?! I landed a hit!"

Yusei smiled, "You see, you're deck is good. You just need to make the right choices. However, its not good enough to beat my deck." He drew his card, "First I'll summon Junk Synchron!" The famous Tuner monster appeared before them. Junk Synchron ATK: 1300 "Next I'll activate the card Double Summon, which allows me to summon another monster this turn. And I think I'll summon Nitro Synchron!" In the summoning flash, another Tuner joined the field. Nitro Synchron ATK: 300 "And because I summoned Junk Synchron, I get to summon a level 2 or below monster from my graveyard. And I choose Speed Warrior!" His monster returned from the grave. Speed Warrior DEF: 400

Sylene looked scared, "Uh oh...prepare yourselves you two!" Her monster seemed to nod, but it could just be a trick.

"And now, I'll tune my Speed Warrior with my Junk Synchron, to Synchro Summon Junk Warrior!" With a pull of his cord, Junk Synchron soon burst in a surge of energy, three rings encircling Speed Warrior. Two stars appeared from him, and soon a new monster appeared. Junk Warrior appeared, posing in the way he always does after being summoned. Junk Warrior ATK: 2300

Sylene panicked, "I-Its okay Sylene...h-he can only destroy one monster..."

"Maybe, but first, Junk Warrior's ability activates. You see, since Nitro Synchron is a Level 2, that means Junk Warrior gains the attack power of him." Soon Junk Warrior's attack points raised to 3100. "And now, Junk Warrior attack Ambulance Rescueroid! Go Scrap Fist!" Junk Warrior charged in for an attack. "Oh, and before he destroys a monster, I'll activate this card, Domino Effect."

Slyene looked scared, "W-What does that do?"

"If I discard a card from my hand for every monster you have, I can destroy them all in one move. So by discarding one card, Truckroid goes down with him!"

"WHAT?!" As Scrap Fist made contact, Ambulance Rescueroid toppled over and landed on Truckroid. They were both destroyed, much to Sylene's disappointment. However, due to the initial attack, Sylene only lost 800 life points, dropping hers down to 2400. "And now, my next attack will commence."

Sylene looked at him, "How? Nitro Synchron doesn't have enough attack points to take me down."

"Yes, but I'm not attacking, I'm tuning." Sylene gulped in fear. The meter on the monster's head hit the end, and soon Junk Warrior was encircled by two rings. A new monster soon appeared, a massive and scary monster. "I Snychro Summon, Nitro Warrior!" Nitro Warrior roared in fury. Nitro Warrior ATK: 2800 "And now Nitro Warrior's special ability activates, since I used a Spell card this turn, his attack points increase by 1000. But since I used two, that means he gains an even bigger boost." Nitro Warrior's points added up.

"N-N-No way...4800 attack points?!" Sylene nearly screamed.

"That's right, now Nitro Warrior attack! Dynamite Crunch!" Sylene could only panic as Yusei's monster rocketed towards her with all those points. The sheer result knocked her back, causing her deck and hand to fall. She laid there in a slump, Life Points now at 0. The duel ended, Akiza running up to Yusei.

"Yusei, what happened to giving her a confidence boost?!" she asked him angrily. "You didn't have to pull a move like that!"

Sylene laid on the ground as they argued, crying. Her tears hit the cards below her. She whimpered, "I-I'm a failure...to all of those before me...I-I don't deserve you guys..." She cried a bit more, trying to hide herself from the world. Footsteps approached, and she was well aware who they were. Yusei bent down and picked up a card, a card that was in her hand.

"You could have won you know..." Sylene looks up to him, confused. "One you could have attacked with that fusion of yours first, and then used your Truckroid to steal Speed Warrior. The other is that you could have saved yourself with this card." He held it up, showing it was her monster Kiteroid. "This card was in your hand, and when you discard it to your graveyard with no monsters..."

"...it negates all battle damage for the turn" Sylene added on.

"Sylene, you're not a bad duelist, and your deck is not bad either. You just need to look in your cards and start adapting to the duel as it progresses." He put his hand out, "We can help you if you life."
1423121221.title: Dueling Confidence

14231212212.content:
Sylene shook her head, tears falling, "I...I...I..." She pushed his hand away and ran off, her deck and duel disk falling to the ground. She ran off, not even looking back. Yusei and Akiza were both surprised. As she ran off, the others came by. Crow was the first to speak up, "Hey, what was all that about?"

Yusei began picking up her deck. Jack and Crow came closer. "Yusei, who was that girl you just dueled?" asked Jack.

"Her name is Sylene" he said. "She was a classmate of Akiza's who she asked me to give her some confidence in her deck."

Jack huffs, "That sure didn't look like confidence to me. Don't you think Yusei would be a bad choice for an easy win? He's not one to throw a duel for a girl."

"I just thought..." Akiza went silent as Yusei stood.

"He's right Akiza. I should have went easier on her than the way that I did. But I thought she would know her own deck well enough to put up a good fight." He placed the deck back into her duel disk. He faced Akiza, "We should return these to her."

The twins, Leo and Luna, soon approached. "Hey Akiza, wasn't that Sylene?" asked Leo.

"Did something happen?" asked Luna. "She didn't look to happy."

Akiza just sighed as a response. The two told everyone to enter the garage so they could explain. The reactions were all mixed; Jack felt like Sylene really was a wimp who couldn't duel, Crow felt sorry for her, Luna was concerned for her and her deck, and Leo was just too interested in her deck and the battle. "I never even heard of a Vehicroid Deck before!" Leo exclaimed, "So cool!"

"That's because the Vehicroid's were one of the first fusion decks to be created back when fusion monsters became a big deal" Yusei explained. "Not many duelists use a fusion deck anymore."

Leo nodded, "Yeah, hardly any good duelist uses them."

Jack faced the boy twin with anger, "I use some Fusion monsters you little brat!"

As they argued, Luna approached. "I listened to her cards, and they say that she's a really good person" she explained. "But she is always pressured by her family and friends to be replaced."

Akiza shook her head, "That deck has been passed down since her great grandparent Syrus Truesdale used it in Duel Academy before the city was redone. If I was her I couldn't imagine replacing this deck." She faced them, "I know where she lives, so we could probably return the deck to her, along with her duel disk."

Yusei nodded, "Mind if I tag along?"
14231212212.title: Depressed

choices: Sylene stays and introduced herself to the boy
Sylene runs past the boy and goes bursting into tears again
142312122122.content:
As Sylene was running to her home on the richer side of New Domino City, she kept passing other people, still crying and dropping tears, as she said, "Excuse me," weakly to pedestrians. Sylene was walking downhill as she came to her corner to turn when suddenly, Sylene collided with a another person, surprising her and the other person, who was a boy her age.

The boy dusted himself off and got up and extended a hand to Sylene, saying, "Sorry, I wasn't watching where I was going." Then the boy noticed that her eyes were red and she wouldn't make eye contact when he spoke to her and then asked, "Is something wrong?" The boy got worried, even though he didn't know what happened to her, he wanted to help her or listen to her problems.
142312122122.title: Accidents happen.....

1423121221222.content:
She was still too emotional, so she simply brushed him to the side and ran off. More tears fell down her face than ever. "Uh...okay..." Before the boy could walk off, two duel runners revved by. Even though they were fast, the boy recognized them. "Yusei...Akiza?"

Down the street, they stopped in front of a really tall and luxurious building. Yusei took his helmet off, "Sylene sure lives in a nice place."

"Its no wonder" Akiza replied, "She's a Truesdale. They're one of the richest families here in Neo Domino. They're not the wealthiest, but their up there." Akiza placed her helmet down in her duel runner. She managed to glance down to what looked like a garage. Outside looked like a scooter, but it seemed to also look like a motorcycle. "I never knew Sylene had a license for those."

Before Yusei could looked, a voice caught his attention more. "Yusei? Is that you bro?"

He turned and smiled, "Adam, nice to see you again." They shook hands as they approached. "Thanks again for that part I needed."

"After everything, it was the least I could do." He looked to his friend. "And this must be Akiza. I must agree with you Yusei, she is quite fetching." This caused both Yusei to give Adam an angry look, and for Akiza to turn from embarrassment. "So, are you two trailing that girl too?"

"What girl?"

"You know, tall, beautiful, glasses, long gray hair, crying a lot..."

"That's Sylene" Akiza spoke, "And we're trying to return her deck." She held it up, "She dropped it and ran from losing against Yusei."

"I lost against Yusei before" he spoke, "I never really wanted to do that..."

"Yeah, but you don't have the constant taunting" Yusei added. "Sylene is taunted by others, and even her family that her deck needs to change." Adam instantly looked saddened by this statement. "I was hoping a duel would help show her that she could win, but it seems like I only made it worse."

Adam looked at her deck, the one in Akiza's hands. "Yusei...let me talk to her." Both Akiza and Yusei looked up to him from that. "If anyone understands this girl its me. I was once at the bottom with my deck, but now I'm a good duelist and I hardly use any of those new Synchros...let me." Yusei nodded, asking Akiza to hand him the deck. After Adam grabbed the deck, he leaned in, "You know...there could be something else you could do to cheer her up..." He glanced back at her motorcycle.
1423121221222.title: Stranger Confirmed

14231212212221.content:
At the very top of the building, inside the penthouse, Sylene laid out in her bed, crying into her pillow. Her hair was a mess, glasses setting on her desk, and dressed in messy sleepwear. She kept sobbing, crying out even though her tears ran out a while back. I'll never become a good duelist...even with a new deck, I'll never be on top...

There was a knock at her door. She turned away, "Go away dad...I know you want to give more deck suggestions..."

"Uh...sorry, I'm not your dad." Sylene was shocked because she knew that voice just recently, and no one usually knew where she lived. She approached her door and opened it, seeing the boy from before. He glanced down but smiled, "Uh, did I come at a bad time?"

Sylene looked down and blushed, covering herself up with a blanket. "What are you doing here?!"

"I thought I'd return a deck..." She looked down, seeing that it was her deck. She turned, "That deck isn't mine...it belongs to someone else."

"That's funny, I could have sworn that this was your deck. I mean, not many Fusion decks still exist, and this one is pretty good."

"Its not..." Sylene slumped back onto her bed, "Nothing of mine is ever good. That deck may be good, but I'm not."

Adam walked over and sat on the edge of her bed. "Look Sylene, I know you hardly know me, and I'm probably invading like three rules of your personal space, but I do know a couple of things. People set yourself shorter than what they think. You are a good duelist, you just need to look at your cards and not be nervous. If you learn your deck inside and out, then you wouldn't have to worry about it." Adam stood, but placed the deck on her dresser. "Just, think about it." He walked out, closing the door as he did.

A hour passed, and Sylene never moved from that spot. However, it was almost like some of her cards were speaking to her. She finally got up, went to her dresser, and picked up her deck. She drew the first card, her favorite one too, Gyroid. She looked at the burned edges, seeing as how she saved that card after some bullies tried to burn it. As she looked at the card, it seemed like the picture moved. Gyroid blinked at her, which scared Sylene slightly. She looked down at him, smiling, "Well, if you guys think I can do it..." She nodded, "Then I will!" She was soon on her bed, her deck spread out with all of her cards out and about. She spent the night, looking over each one.
14231212212221.title: Pep Talk

choices: She wants to duel Yusei/someone else
142312122122211.content:
The next morning was a bit of a rough one. Sylene never went to sleep, and when she did, her cards were everywhere. Then, her alarm went off loudly, startling her. She fell on the opposite side of the bed, slamming her forehead off the ground. She held her ears, "Why did I set it on a Saturday?!" Then, without cause, it went off. She got up, looking at her clock. Usually her clock only stopped whenever she slammed it. The only thing near her clock was the burned Gyroid card. Again, she picked it up. The card winked at her once more. She smiled, "Looks like you're looking out for me..."

Despite the weirdness going on, she pushed it aside. She studied her deck all night, every card she ever got. In truth she had more than a Vehicroid deck, she had a few other cards from her friends at the academy. So, she put them in there and they seemed to work. She walked to her closet and looked at her wardrobe. Besides her school uniform, she did not have much else. She pondered, "I wonder...maybe I should...make a new statement for my new confidence..." She grabbed several of her other clothes and ran off out of her room.

----------------------

Back at the garage, Yusei was still working on his project. It was hidden underneath a white tarp for secrecy. He, Bruno, and Adam were inside helping. Adam wiped his forehead of the sweat and grease, "I never thought you would actually do this..."

Yusei stood next, "Well it's a good idea. Giving her that talk of yours was a good start to get her interested. And maybe if she could Turbo Duel she could become even greater."

Bruno nodded, "You're just lucky that we had enough scrap and such to make this. Though, I doubt I would ever make this again."

The other two nodded. Adam shuffled through his deck, "I'm just hoping my talk was enough. I'm ready to show what I'm made of to this girl. Though, I told her I didn't use Synchro Monsters..."

Yusei placed a hand on his shoulder, "That was nice of you, and knowing you, Sylene probably is better."

"She must be with what she's wearing..." Bruno pointed out to the entrance. There stood Sylene, however she was far off from the quiet schoolgirl she was yesterday. The outfit she wore revealed it. It was obvious what she wore was a collage of different pieces, but it fitted together nicely. She wore a blue vest with a black undershirt but with short sleeves and a V neck that showed a bit of her chest, but only a bit. She wore a slacked white skirt with free falling frills of pink fabric that drifted down near the ground. Her hair was kept together in front of her face over her left eye, and in the back of her head as two separate ponytails coming from the same point in the back. She still wore her glasses.

"Hello boys" she spoke with a smile.

"Sylene?" asked Yusei. "What...are you wearing?"

Sylene blushed, "Uh, well, I figured since all of you guys have signature looks...I though I could too..." She twirled around, "What do you think?"

"You look nice" Adam said as he approached. "However are you ready to face me?"

"Face you...?"

"Yeah, Yusei told me about yesterday, so I figured you might as well duel someone else. What do you think?"
142312122122211.title: Prepped Up

choices: Part 2 of Adam and Slyene's Duel
1423121221222111.content:
Adam saw Sylene's smile and heard her say, "Yes, let's duel, Adam." Adam smiled as he grabbedmhis nearby rag and wipped off his sweat and the grease. A few moments later, Adam (who was dressed in a black vest with a Blue Dragon Emblem on his back, showing off his arm muscle and was wearing a pair of black fingerless gloves, which matched his dark denim blue jeans and black and blue high top sneakers and was also wearing a sliver necklace, but she couldnt see was hanging on the chain, since it was hidden in the vest and the shirt under the vest.) and Sylene walked outside the garage and walked 20 paces distance and prepared their decks by shuffling them as Bruno and Yusei walked outside and being watching them prepare until both Sylene and Adam were ready and said, "Let's Duel."

Sylene: 4000 Adam: 4000

Sylene drew her first card, "The first move is mine!" She looked at her hand. "First, I'll summon a monster in face down Defense position!" The card appeared, "And now I end my turn."

Adam spoke before he drew his card, "A fine first move, my draw." Adam looked at his hand. "I summon Axe Dragonute in attack mode. *2000/1200* Now, Axe Dragonute, show us what the face down is, with Flying Axe Fury. Axe Dragonute jumped into the air and it's giant axe landed on the face-down.

The card flipped up, showing it was Des Koala. *DEF 1800* Sylene smiled, "You shouldn't have done that." Before the monster was destroyed, he swiped his claws towards Adam. "You see, Des Koala has a flip effect. For every card in your hand, you take 400 points of damage for each one!" Since Adam had five, he was hit with 2000 points of damage. She smiled, "Not a bad way to start if I do say so myself."

Sylene: 4000 Adam: 2000

Adam chuckled, "Nice trap, Sylene, I wasn't expecting that. So, now my effect of Dragonute activates and moves him to defense mode, and I'll place two face downs and end my turn." Adam smiled and got ready for Sylene's next turn. *DEF: 1200*

Sylene drew her next card. "I summon Submarineroid in Attack mode!"  "And now, I'll activate his special effect! He can attack you directly!" With that her monster dove into the ground. A upheaved trail of dirt traveled his way, knocking another 800 points of damage off. "Then, thanks to his special ability, he is switched into defense mode!"  "I end my turn with two face downs."

Sylene: 4000 Adam: 1200

Adam chuckled and said, before he drew, "Alright, time to change it up, my draw." Adam looked at the card and smiled. "I summon Alexandrite Dragon in Attack mode. *2000/100* But I'm not done yet, I play a spell card, Dragonic Tactics. By tributing two dragon monsters on the field, I can special summon one powerful dragon from my deck." Both Axe Dragonute and Alexandrite disevaperated and their dust took the form a dragon, and then Adam smiled again and spoke, "I special summon the Blue Eyes White Dragon!" *3000/2500*
The great white dragon gave a mighty roar and Adam smiled turned to grin and added, "Now I play my other face down spell, known as Forbidden Lance and put it on my Blue-Eyes White Dragon, it might cost him 800 attack points, but he is immune to Spell and Traps for the rest of the turn, now Blue-Eyes, attack the Submarineroid with Forbidden White Lighting." After Submarineroid was destroyed, Adam placed two more face downs and ended his turn, wanting to see how Sylene could beat his Blue-Eyes White Dragon.

Sylene lost a bit of confidence, but she drew and looked at them. "Before I do anything, you activated my face down card, Supercharge! This allows me to draw two cards." She drew them both.

"I place another card in face down defense, then activate the spell card Double Summon!" She looked at her hand. "This spell allows me to normal summon another monster this turn. And I choose, one of my favorites, Gyroid in Attack Mode!"

She summoned her helicopter.  Sylene looked shocked at her monster. Instead of the normal design, this Gyroid had scorch marks on it's body and a few dings in it. It's rotor spun in anger as it stared up at the dragon.

"Uh...I end my turn with a face down."

Adam thought, "I need to get her confidence up or else she may not duel again." Adam then spoke, "My Draw." Adam drew his card and said, "I play Trade-In, so I ditch my Darkstorm Dragon to draw two cards and I end my turn with a face down." Adam saw the Gyroid's body and he felt something with this card as he glared at him.

Sylene looked surprised, "Wait, why didn't you attack?" Gyroid's rotor spun, looking back at her. She nodded and understood, "Okay Adam, I'll go offensive then! I draw!" She looks at her hand. "Now it's time for me to show you another card given to me, I summon a girl with firepower, its Elemental Hero Burstinatrix!" The heroine came out in her blaze of glory. *ATK 1200* Adam was shocked to see that specific card and backstepped. "An Elemental Hero card? Those cards are really old, Sylene, But now, Let's see what you are planning Sylene, it is still your turn." Adam shocked turned into a smile. "A friend gave her to me. I have a bunch of powerful female monsters in my deck, but I managed to balance them inside. And since you won't attack, I might as well show you what my face down is. Come on up Sonic Jammer!" *DEF: 650* The card was revealed, and a small cricket-like machine appeared.  "Now, Sonic Jammer's flip effect activates! And thanks to this effect, that mean you cannot activate any Spell cards until the end phase of the next turn!" The monster's wings vibrated, and cascaded a shrill sound onto Adam. "But Sonic Jammer isn't sticking for long, because I'm sacrificing him to summon, UFOroid in Attack mode!"

Sonic Jammer burst into energy, and out from the center formed UFOroid. *ATK 1200*  Sylene smiled, "And now...Gyroid...time to get a power boost." However before she could activate the card, the monster shook his head. She was surprised, but confused. The gleam in his eye showed that he wanted to take that dragon down all by himself. She smiled, "Alright then, time to change tactics! I activate my face down, Call of the Haunted!" The card revealed itself, "And with it I can summon a monster from my Graveyard, so say hello again to Des Koala!" *DEF: 1800* As the smoke cleared, the cuddly koala appeared. 

"But I'm not done! I'm activating the Equip Spell, United We Stand! And I'll equip it onto Gyroid!" Soon, the helicopter started to glow. "Now, Gyroid gains 800 attack and defense points for every monster I have on the field, and since I have three, that gives him 2400 points!" Gyroid *ATK 3400* spun his rotor as his Attack increased.  "Now Gyroid, attack Blue Eyes White Dragon!" Rotor spinning fast, Gyroid lifted off of the ground and charged towards the dragon.

"Sorry to end an amazing turn, I play a trap called Draining Shield. Now, Instead of your Gyroid hitting my dragon, It hits my shield, giving me Life points equal to your monsters attack points. The shield cut off Gyroid from Blue-Eyes White Dragon and Adam's life points go up from 1200 to 4600. "That was a great move, Sylene, It seems you took my advice." Adam was really happy now that she studied her deck.

Slyene: 4000 Adam: 4600

Gyroid came back, looking a bit angrier than ever. Sylene sighed, "I...I lay a face down and end my turn." She placed it down. Now she had only two cards in her hand, and four monsters out. Three in Attack mode, and one in Defense mode. Gyroid's power up was good, but the other three could be better. Sylene looked to her monster, "Sorry Gyroid, I failed you again..." Gyroid looked back, looking concerned.

TO BE CONTINUED.....
1423121221222111.title: A Duel against Friends; Adam vs Sylene [Part 1]

choices: Part 3 and the Conclusion of Adam vs Sylene
14231212212221111.content:
Adam: 4600 Sylene: 4000

Adam then interrupted, "Sylene, you didn't fail your monster. He still believes in you, just like you should believe in yourself and your deck." Adam then took a breath and added, "It's my turn, I draw. I summon Golem Dragon in Defense Mode *200/2000*, now you can only attack Golem Dragon since I control one other dragon." Adam was thinking very hard, he had one card where he could just make it hard for a comeback, but he thought it would shatter her confidence, and said, "I place one card face down and Now, Blue-Eyes, attack Des Koala with White Lighting.

Sylene looked hesitant, but she performed. "I activate my face down, Switch!" Her card revealed itself. "This allows me to switch the attack target of your monster's attack, and I choose UFOroid!" The attack hit UFOroid, making her Life Points drop to 2200. "This activates UFOroid's special ability, which allows me to summon a Machine-type Monster with les than 1500 ATK points! And guess who's making a reappearance? Submarineroid!" The Monster appeared, armed and ready.  "And now, my Trap Card activates, Supercharge! Which allows me to draw two more cards." She smiled at what they were.

Adam: 4600 Sylene: 2200

Adam remained silent to see what she was planning and had a big smile on his face.

"Okay, its my turn!" She drew her next card and smiled. "Okay, I'll activate the spell card Vehicroid Connection Zone! Which now, I can fuse monsters in my hand or on the field. So I'm fusing Submarineroid, along with Drillroid and Steamroid that's in my hand, and so to create Super Vehicroid Jumbo Drill!" Her monsters appeared but disappeared, and soon the massive vehicle appeared.  "The best part about this monster is that when it attacks a monster that's in Defense mode, then the difference is dealt to you as damage. Go Jumbo Drill! Attack Golem Dragon!" Her monster buried itself in the ground and charged towards his monster.

Adam didn't activate any of his facedowns and his life points dropped to 3200. Adam was smiling that she brought out a fusion monster.

Sylene smiled, pumped up with new confidence, "Now, I think its time for round two! Gyroid, attack Blue Eyes White Dragon!" Gyroid lifted off and charged straight towards him.

Now it is my turn to counter, I play a spell card, Forbidden Chalice, here is how it works, The monster it equips to gains 400 attack points but loses it's effect, so I'll give the cup to my Blue-Eyes, making our attacks even ground, and I wouldn't say goodbye to Blue-Eyes yet, cause I play the other face down, Impenetrable Attack, now my Blue-Eyes can't be destroyed this battle phase. The Blue-Eyes growled as his tail crashed into Gyroid, but neither moved or shattered.

"I activate Gyroid's ability! Once per turn, Gyroid becomes invincible in battle! So he's not going anywhere!"

Gyroid landed back in his spot. "I switch Burstinatrix into Defense mode and lay down one face down. I end..." she now had three face down cards, and one card in her hand.

Adam: 3200 Sylene: 2600

Adam smiled and drew his next card, "My draw." Adam looked at his four card hand and said, "I play a spell card known as Foolish Burial, now I get to place one card from my deck to the grave, which shall be another Blue-Eyes White Dragon. And I'll summon my favorite little dragon, Decoy Dragon in defense mode. DEF: 200 Now I reveal my face down, Raregold Armor, and equip it to my Decoy Dragon, now you can only attack him. And I'll lay one face down, to finish my turn.

Yusei could tell Adam was toying with her, but he also knew that it was all for confidence building and that having his top monster out would give her a lot of confidence if she could destroy it.

Decoy Dragon...I'm not familiar with the dragon cards, but I do know what a decoy is. Attacking with Jumbo Drill could be risky...

"My turn" she spoke as she drew her card. "I first activate my face down, Ring of Life. By send a monster to the Graveyard, I can gain Life Points equal to that monsters Defense points. So I'm choosing DES Koala, so I gain 1800 Life Points." Her points raised to 4000. "Unfortunately, because of United We Stand, Gyroid's Attack points drop by 800." 

Gyroid looked back, but saw that she was only being cautious. "Now I switch Burstinatrix into Attack mode, and she'll attack Decoy Dragon! Go!" The heroine shot flames at the small dragon.

Adam interrupted, "Sorry to disappoint, but my dragon's effect activates. Now I get special summon a level 7 or higher Dragon from my grave, and he becomes your new attack target, so guess who is making an appearance, Rise! Blue-Eyes White Dragon in attack mode! A second Blue-Eyes White Dragon appeared next to the first and used his tail to deflect the fireball back at the female Hero, causing Sylene's life points to drop down to 2200.

Adam: 3600 Sylene: 2200

(TO BE CONTINUED. Sorry I had to so I could get this chapter up.)
14231212212221111.title: Part 2 of Adam and Slyene's Duel

choices: Sylene stays for awhile as Adam goes back to work
142312122122211111.content:
Since Brustinatrix's destruction, Gyroid's attack went down to 1800, and Sylene's hesitation made her say, "I lay..one face down and end my turn."

Adam then spoke to Sylene, "Don't get nervous, Sylene, trust your deck and it will guide you. My draw." Adam drew his next card and frowned since he had three to her two. "I just play a face down and end my turn." Adam then thought, "I cant trust those face-downs, I better play it safe, at least Jumbo Drill can attack Decoy Dragon and she will have the lead in points." Adam had one card in his hand, waiting for it to be used.

Sylene was confused, Why would he just lay a face down? He's planning something. "My draw..." She drew her next card. "Okay..." She looked at her fusion monster. "Jumbo Drill, attack Decoy Dragon!" The monster dug beneath the earth and tunneled its way over.

Adam watched his favorite dragon be destroyed as his life points go down to 800, giving Sylene the lead.

Adam: 800 Sylene: 2200

Sylene looked happy. "Okay, now I activate my face down, Diffusion! And as the name states, I can now take apart a fusion monster back into it's components." Jumbo Drill separated, and soon three monsters took it's place. * Steamroid: 1800, Submarineroid 800, Drillroid 1600*

"And now, due to United We Stand, Gyroid gets a boost!" *ATK 4200*  "Now Gyroid attack Blue Eyes White Dragon!" Gyroid charged once more.

Adam had a small smile as the little helicopter charged at Blue-Eyes and then watched him turn into dust, sending the rest of his life points to zero, giving Sylene the victory as the other monsters vanished.

Sylene was amazed, "I...I won...?" She smiled greatly, "I won. I won! I WON!" She did a small cheer, happy as can be. However, Gyroid never disappeared. He looked to Adam with a small glare. But, he nodded, bowing a bit.

Yusei and Burno looked astonished, but Yusei had a smile on his face. Adam then put his cards back into his side pocket, and his duel disk on his back, and walked over to her and extended his hand, saying, "That was a good duel, Sylene." Adam then had a grin on his face.

Sylene shook hands with him, "Thanks for dueling with me Adam. You are a good duelist, and I am sure that..." She sneered at him, "Wait, did you just let me win?"

"Not at all," Adam began, "my facedowns were bluffs and my card in the hand was missing the last piece of the puzzle. And let me show you the next card on my deck." Adam pulled out his deck and flipped over the top card, which was Polymerization, and Adam's hand card was the last Blue-Eyes White Dragon. "If you didn't use De-Fusion, I would of taken the match."

Sylene looked surprised, "Oh..." She smiled, "Well, I'm glad I did what I did." She shook his hand, "May we duel again."

"It may be sooner than you think," Adam smiled.

After a few moments of talking between both Adam and Sylene, Yusei and Bruno walked back into the garage, knowing Adam was going to take a while. Sylene had now a closer look at Adam's necklace, but still couldnt see the whole thing, but saw a blue eye. Adam kept his smile the whole time as they spoke about the duel and how she felt after she won.
142312122122211111.title: Part 3 and the Conclusion of Adam vs Sylene

1423121221222111111.content:
After the duel, Sylene decided to stay. Akiza came by and was immediately bombarded by her friend of the duel. It wasn't until later that Jack and Crow showed up as well as the twins. The whole gang was together, and everyone was getting used to the new face. Sylene never knew that she could make any friends, let alone friends with the famous Team 5D's. The whole team was equally balanced; Crow was the heart, Jack was the backbone, Bruno was the brains, Akiza was the willpower, the twins were the spirit, and Yusei was the soul. Everyone seemed to balance out each other's weak points.

As the boys were working on something, Sylene was chatting with the twins and Akiza. "You see" she started, "My deck may be a hand me down from my great grandparent, but I also picked up a few cards along the way. Some are actually almost as old as the Vehicroids. It took me till now to see that these cards are still cards."

Akiza smiled at that statement. She was happy to hear her friend was feeling better. The twins were looking through her deck. "These cards are so cool!" Leo commented, "I never knew older cards could be so amazing! I only wish I was here to see them duel!" He looked up to her, "You have to duel me some time!"

She smiled, "Maybe later. I think I had enough excitement for one day."

"Oh, hey!" Leo ran over to his Duel Board and got his backpack. He opened it up and pulled a few cards out. He ran back over, "I know you like your deck, but here." He placed the cards in her hand, "I thought that you might like to try what we try." Sylene took the cards and looked over them. They were Tuner monsters, all of them. They were cute, at least to Sylene. And they were all Machine monsters too.

"Here, you can have one of mine too" Akiza spoke as she gave a card to her.

She stopped them. "Please, I cannot take these. I hardly have any Synchro Monsters..."

"Not yet." The small group turned to see Jack approach. Sylene's face lit up bright red as he did. Jack handed down two cards, "Picked up a card from some scumbag, thought you might want to have it instead. And I threw in one of my Tuner monsters too." Her hands were shaking, but Sylene did manage to take them. She could not believe the kindness she was receiving. Tears were forming in the corner of her eyes.

"Huh?" spoke Leo, "Why are you crying? You aren't sad are you?"

She shook her head, a smile forming. "No...I'm happy..." Sylene spoke with heavy tears, "I never been treated with such kindness in my life...thank you." The others around her gave off an expression of proudness and content. "I...I don't know how this day could get better..."

Suddenly the sound of an engine roared. This caught the attention of everyone away from the bike. Yusei, Bruno, Adam, and Crow each wore a smile, and Jack was smiling too. "We have a good idea..." Yusei spoke as he took the tarp off.

What was underneath caused Sylene's heart to race. It was her scooter, or what used to be her scooter. It was now a supped up speed machine. It still held its scooter-like structure, but it had parts more of a Duel Runner now. It shimmered with a glossy new coat of paint. Closer inspection saw that it was the same color scheme as Gyroid, her signature card. She shakingly approached the Runner with uneasy steps. "Do you think she likes it?" asked Luna.

Sylene suddenly fell over; she fainted from the excitement. "I believe she does" Akiza spoke.
1423121221222111111.title: Getting with the Century

14231212212221111112.content:
It took a good ten minutes just to get Sylene to wake up. She was rather embarrassed for fainting on her friends, but they all seemed fine with it. She spent the rest of the day learning the basics of her new Duel Runner. Since she was also a Fusion Monster user, Jack gave her some Speed Spells that would help her whenever she gets used to it. Yusei helped make a helmet for her so it would be easier on her. Everything was set and seemed right, but now all she needed was to get a Duel Runner License. The sun began to set and the city's lights began to glow. Sylene pulled her runner out. "You sure you want to ride that tonight?" asked Akiza.

"How else will I get home?" she asked. "But don't worry Akiza, Yusei said that my runner is exactly like my scooter, which means I already know how to run it."

"Scooters don't go as fast."

"I'll be fine Akiza, don't worry, I'll call you when I get home to prove it." She got on her runner and placed her helmet on. A rev of her engine she rode off from the garage and into town. Sylene was lying slightly; the speed was a bit overwhelming. But she got the hang of it after a few minutes. The feeling was wonderful; the adrenaline, the wind through her hair, it was wonderful.

But all good things come to an end. Someone rammed into Sylene's runner, causing her to swerve and wobble. She quickly got back her bearings and looked back. Another Duel Runner, and a punkish one at that. The guy on the runner did not look to friendly though. "Well well well, what do we have here? Nice Runner there girly" he spoke in a heavy accent.
