"Looks brand new, and that will make it even more expensive when I sell it!" He tried to ram her again and again.

Sylene quickly hit the intercom on her helmet. She tried to take each hit as the call went through. "Hello?" it was Yusei's voice.

"Yusei! Please come help me!" she shouted. "Some lunatic is trying to ram my Runner! He wants to sell it!"

"That sounds a lot like Syd. Be careful Sylene, you don't want to mess with this guy." With that the feed was dropped.

Syd was now evenly paced with her in the streets. "Hey girly, tell you what. How 'bout we Turbo Duel for the Runner? If I win, you give your sweet little Runner ta me."

As much as she wanted to disagree, she knew the kind of person Syd was. He would not leave her alone if she backed down. A new confidence arose in her. "Okay, but if I win, I get to pick some of the cards out of your deck."

He smirked, "Oh, that won't be a problem girly. I accept your little wager, but I hope you won't live far away after I beat ya."

Each duelist touched their screen. "Duel Mode Engaged. Auto Pilot standing by." Each Runner set itself up for the duel. Sylene watched as her new put together deck was shuffled. Let's hope this deck is as good as I can make it. Otherwise me and my runner are done for. "Let's Duel!" they both shouted.

Sylene: 4000 Syd: 4000
14231212212221111112.title: Pressured into a Duel

142312122122211111121.content:
Syd smirked to himself, "I'll tell ya what girly, you can go first."

"Oh your such a gentleman" she spoke sarcastically. Sylene got all of her cards out and looked through them. She did not have a bad hand, but she knew she would have to get her Speed Counters up to use Speed Fusion. Sylene got one, "I summon Patroid in ATK mode!" Her police car Vehicroid came out rolling on beside her. Patroid ATK: 1200 "I then lay two face downs and end my turn."

With the turn end, each one gained a Speed Counter. Syd smirked again as he drew a card, "Ya call that a monster? Please, I've seen children's drawings that were scarier! And probably more powerful too!" He looked to his card and smirked, "Like this guy for example. I summon Assault Wheel in ATK mode!" Assault Wheel: 2300

Sylene gasped, "T-T-Twenty three hundred Attack points?!"

"Yep, that's right girly, this is a REAL monster card. And now I will attack your little Patroid! Only thing is, my monster causes yours to switch to Defense!" Patroid folded up in response. Patroid DEF: 1200 "But don't think your safe girly! Whenever Assault Wheel attacks a monster in DEF mode the difference in points is directed at you as damage!" With the destruction of Patroid, Sylene's points were reduced by 1100. Sylene: 2900 Also with that, her only speed counter was now lost. "But some good news to ya Girly, my Assault Wheel's ATK points drop to 0 until the standy phase of my next turn. So I put a couple of face downs and call it a move."

Sylene grunted as she drew a card. It will be hard to take out that monster of his. Along with the two face downs he had, she was afraid of losing. But she could not lose, not when her friends gave her so much. "Its my turn you scumbag! And because you destroyed a Vehicroid monster I can activate Supercharge! Which allows me to draw two more cards!" She drew the amount. One of her cards was Gyroid, and again the card picture moved slightly. He looked like he wanted to tear that guy apart. She smiled, "I think I'll star by activating my other face down, the Trap card Call of the Haunted!" Her card flipped, an eerie mist poured out of it. "This card allows me to summon a monster from my graveyard, and guess who's making a comeback? Patroid!" The police car made a reappearance. "And now I summon Gyroid in ATK mode!" Her favorite monster came out flying high beside her. Gyroid: 1000 "Now Patroid attack Assault Wheel!"

"Not so fast! I activate my trap card! Plunder Decoy!" The card flipped up, and immediately hands reached out. "Now since you targeted a monster on my field, I can gain control of a monster on your field. Hehe, and it seems like there is only one card to take." Sylene gasped as the hands grabbed Gyroid. Gyroid fought but was dragged to his side.

"Patroid stop!" The monster skidded to a halt whenever Gyroid appeared in front of him.

"What's wrong girly? Afraid to attack your own monster?"

"No, but I can still attack your Assault Wheel!" Patroid sped up one more time. "I don't think so, I have another trap! I activate Nightmare Wheel!" A sinister looking wheel fell from above and landed hard onto Patroid. He stopped moving and came back to a halt. "Thanks to this card, your monster cannot change battle modes or attack. But the best part is by each of my standby phases you get 500 points of damage dealt to you."

Sylene looked infuriated, "First you steal my favorite card, and now this! Oh, you will pay for this Crome Dome!" She threw down three cards face down, "You're move you jerk!"

"Finally..." he drew a card, "Oh, and now since its my Standby Phase, Nightmare Wheel activates and you get 500 points of damage!" Sylene: 2400 "Oh, and guess who's getting their ATK points back?" Assault Wheel's points go up back to 2300. "But that's not all that I am doing, I summon the Tuner Monster Cannon Wheel!" Cannon Wheel ATK: 500

Sylene looked devastated, "Don't tell me you will..."

"That's right girly, I'm going to modify my Assault Wheel!" Sylene could say she was a bit relieved that Gyroid was not who he was going to use, but still she would be in trouble. She watched as the two monsters disappeared and in a flash a new monster appeared. "I Synchro Summon Combat Wheel!" The hideous monster appeared before them. Combat Wheel: 2500 "Now you're probably wondering why I didn't take your lousy monster to use eh? Well, I think it would be very ironic to be destroyed by your own monster! But first, Cannon Wheel's effect activates, and since it was a part of a successful Synchro Summoning, you get 500 points of damage!" Sylene: 1900 "And now Combat Wheel will destroy your pathetic monster!"

"I don't think so Syd!" she shouted "I activate Magic Cylinder! This turns all of the ATK points of your monster on you instead!" Syd grunted as his points dropped by Combat Wheel. Syd: 1500

"Er...I place a card face down. You're move."

"Thank you..." She drew a card, and was shocked at what it was. It was Sinister Sprocket, the monster Jack gave her. She smiled, "I summon Sinister Sprocket!" The Tuner Monster came out right beside her. Sinister Sprocket ATK: 400 "And now I'll activate the Speed Spell Summon Speeder!"

"Wait, you don't have enough Speed Tokens!" Syd looked at his monitor, and saw she indeed had four. "What?! How did you?"

"I activated Slip Stream right before I activated Magic Cylinder. Whenever I have lesser Speed Counters than you, I can use this to gain the same amount. And since I have four, I am able to summon another monster from my hand! And I choose this guy, Truckroid!" The Vehicroid monster came onto the field. Truckroid ATK: 1000

"What are you planning with that?!"

"You'll see, now Sinister Sprocket! Tune with Patroid and Truckroid!" Nightmare Wheel was destroyed as both monsters rose into the air. Sinister Sprocket formed his chain around them, gaining all of their stars. "I Synchro Summon, Mist Wurm!" A massive worm monster came from the ground, spewing out clouds of purple. Mist Wurm ATK: 2500 Sylene looked at the monster in awe, as well as Gyroid. "And now I activate my Wurm's ability! Since he was successfully summoned out, I can choose up to three cards on your field and return them to your hand! But in this case, its also my hand! I'm getting rid of your face down, and your two monsters! Gyroid, time to come home!" Mist Wurm spewed out his mist onto Syd's field. His face down and Combat Wheel came back to his hand, as Gyroid came back to her hand. He looked relieved.

Syd, on the otherhand, was terrified beyond what he's ever been. "You got to be kidding me! You were supposed to be a rookie!"

"No I'm not! Mist Wurm, attack him directly!" Syd screamed as the monster dove onto him and crashed, turning all of his Life Points to 0. His runner stopped as he crashed. She came to a halt too as everything settled down. Sector Security came in on time, along with Yusei and Akiza. Sylene stepped off of her Runner before Akiza nearly tackled her.

"WE TOLD YOU NOT TO GET INVOLVED!" she yelled.

"Akiza! I won!" she made her settle down, "I did fine, I won. And I performed my first Synchro Summoning! Thanks to the cards Jack and you guys gave me!"

Yusei wore a smile, "Good work Sylene. You just may be able to have others change their opinion after all."

But once again, the good feeling was ended as a police officer came. "Mam, do you have the license to run this Due Runner?" She gulped in fear, hoping she wasn't going to be set away. Yusei however talked to the man before he spoke again. "Well, seeing as how you helped take down our escaped convict, I'll let you off with a warning for today. But make sure you get your license."

"Yes sir!" She ran towards Syd, "Officers wait!" They stopped and turned to face her. Sylene wore a smirk as she approached Syd, "A deal's a deal..." She took his deck and took a few cards out. "I am sure these guys will be better off with me...take him away boys!"

The officers did so with a nod. Sylene walked back to her friends to tell them about the duel. Syd looked back at Sylene as he was being carried off, "I'll get ya Girly, if its the last thing I do..."
142312122122211111121.title: First Turbo Duel

choices: At the half hour, Adam arrives
1423121221222111111211.content:
Sylene woke up the next day near noon, and saw that she had a message on her cell phone minutes from when she awoke. Sylene then started to grab her phone and saw it was from Adam. Sylene then opened the message and saw it read.

"Hey Sylene, I heard about Syd yesterday and also that you don't have your duel runner's license. So I was thinking that we could do that today since you dont have one. If you like to do that today, text me back. -Adam"

Sylene looked at the message and thought about if she wanted to do it, but she knew if she was going to be a duelist, she would have to get her duel runner's license and sent a text back.

"I would like to do that today, Adam, If I'm going to be a duelist, I'm gonna need one. -Sylene"

After a few minutes of Sylene's quick preparation, Adam sent a quick reply to Sylene's message.

"Good for you, Sylene. I'll be there in by the half hour. -Adam"

Sylene had a few moments to get ready for Adam's arrival and get ready to depart from her home and get her duel runner's license.
1423121221222111111211.title: The next day

14231212212221111112112.content:
Half an hour has passed, Sylene was already fully prepared. Her doorbell rung, signaling company. As she left to get the door, she lifted a card. It was her Gyroid Card, and the picture of him was moving. He looked worried. "Gyroid" she spoke, "You don't have to worry. I can become a Turbo Duelist, and I won't forget about you guys." He cocked an eyebrow at her as he gestured the door. Sylene blushed, "Wait, me, him? N-No no no..." She turned from the door just as it opened. "Gyroid, me and Adam are not a thing. B-Besides, I-I don't think he would go with someone like me."

"And why wouldn't I?" the voice surprised Sylene, causing her to turn suddenly. Adam walked in and stroked through her hair. "You are just as beautiful, if not more than any other girl in New Domnino City."

Sylene blushed and smacked his hand away. "C-Can we just prepare for my t-test please!" She walked out of the door with Adam following behind smiling. He followed her out of the door. Sylene's runner was already at the Academy, which means all Sylene had to do is get a proper outfit. The two went to different stores around New Domino. Several stores had a selection, but not many of what Sylene was looking for. Adam even suggested some high ranking stores, but still, nothing really looked good on her. She sighed, "Adam, can't I just duel in what I have?"

"Sylene, not all duelists where what they do in public on a Turbo Duel."

"Yusei, jack, Crow, Leo, Luna, almost every member in that World Grand Prix..."

"Okay" Adam spoke up, "But Akiza does not. And I can almost guarantee you that half of those members in the race don't wear those uniforms constantly. The thing is, you need some kind of outfit."

Sylene snapped her fingers, "Wait! That's it! I know who I can go to!" She ran out of the store, leaving Adam slightly dumbfounded. He got up and followed her.

----------------------

Later, the duo went to the civilian district of New Domino. Sylene and Adam were standing in Sylene's friend's room. "I tell ya girl, its about time you get to me" she spoke as pieces of fabric went flying. The room they were in was filled with the latest in fashion and clothes making technology. The girl approached Sylene with a measuring tape. She had dark skin, blue eyes, and shoulder length black hair. The outfit she was wearing looked like a modified version of the Duel Academy uniform, customized to be sleeveless. "I have designed many clothes myself" she spoke, "But finally I can have a real challenge."

"Thanks for doing this on such short notice Crystal" Sylene replied as she was measured.

"Girl, you know I would do anything to help ya. Now don't you worry, I can get this thing done before your test is! Now just chat with ya boyfriend as I work my magic!" She gave a wink to them before walking off.

Sylene's face was red, "H-He's not my boyfriend!" As her friend left, the two chatted. "So, any idea what I'm facing with?"

"To get your Duel Runner License you need to do two things" Adam explained. "One, you need to complete the training course under a certain amount of time. If you do that, all you need to do is beat the Duelist that they put you against." He turned his head with a scowl, "And beat him down to a pulp..."

"Pardon me?" she asked.

"O-Oh..." He looked back surprised, "Nothing..." A hand was placed on his shoulder. Adam gave a sigh, "The Duelist you'll need to beat is Officer Trudge. He's a Sector Security Officer."

"What's wrong with him?"

"He thinks he's a father of mien or something. He neglects and counters every decision I have ever made. I don't like that man."

"Done!" Sylene and Adam looked up to see Crystal holding a outfit, "I am finished!"

Adam was surprised, "That...was fast."

Sylene got up to change into the outfit her friend made. Crystal was trying to get Adam's measurements, asking for him to take some of his clothes off. But Adama disagreed. "So?" the two looked up, "How do I look?" Sylene's outfit was the same material as any other Duel Runner outfit. The style she wore was different. The outfit cut off the upper sleeves, but then she had sleeves from the lowest part of her upper arm. The sides of her stomach were shown, as well a bit of her chest. The colors she wore were black, silver, and a dark blue. The three colors collided nicely. Adam's eyes were wide. "Wow..." is all he spoke. She blushed as her friend walked up.

"Dang girl! You look good!" she spoke.

Sylene gave her a hug, "Thanks Crystal, I'll pay you back somehow."

Crystal returned the hug but then looked into her eyes, "Sylene, you do not have to do anything, but whoop that test and get that license!" She stopped, "Oh, and before I forget." She gave her a card, "Take this, for some help."

Sylene grasped the card with a smile, "Thank you." She walked off with Adam to get her test done.
14231212212221111112112.title: Getting Prepared

142312122122211111121122.content: Adam and Sylene kept walking out of the civilian sector of New Domino City and walked towards the Duel Academy. Adam would occasionally glance at Sylene's dueling attire and smiled at how cute it. Adam had a lot of faith in Sylene and her new deck, knowing that she was going to win her duel against the clock and Officer Trudge. Adam knew that Trudge would be really cocky in his duel style and try to be very quick to defeat Sylene, but Adam knew that Sylene could do it.
142312122122211111121122.title: Later

choices: First step completed, then came the second part
1423121221222111111211222.content:
Once they were at the Duel Academy, Sylene arrived for part one of her test. Her runner was there and in one piece. She along with several other students were there to receive their Duel Runner Licenses as well. However, when she rolled hers up, the others started to laugh. "Seriously?! Who let her into this thing?" one spoke.

"Turbo Duels are way out of your league, so why don't you just go home?" another shouted.

"She's...so hot." Everyone looked to that student, including Sylene. She quickly walked over with her Runner.

She was at the end, so she had plenty of time to get ready. Sylene watched as the others went on their tests. Some went to slow as others went to fast and crashed badly. She gulped, Oh man...all I did on my first duel was just go in a straight line...if these guys can't do it, how can I? She heard a small whirl, and looked to where she held her deck. She took it out, and once again the card that stuck out was Gyroid. He nodded to her, showing his trust. She smiled, If my cards believe in me, then I can do it. She held the card that Crystal gave her. And now to add someone new. She slipped the card into her deck and took another card out.

"Finally!" the instructor spoke. "We have one that qualifies!" Sylene looked out, it seemed to be a male student. She couldn't see much else of him though. Out of the three others, only two qualified. It was her turn now, "Alright missy, let's see if you got what it takes!" She got on her runner and put her helmet on. "Go!"

The moment he said that she revved the engine and sped off. She was slightly amazed by the rush. The wind through her hair, the speed of her runner. She never felt that in the duel against Syd. She was almost too amazed, but she snapped out of it. She took the first turn, the side of her runner sparked against the ground. But she made it through without crashing. She continued along the course, maintaining speed. She sped through the course and crossed once she started. "You were a little slow on those turns missy!" she heard the instructor through her helmet intercom, "But you made it up in those quick bursts in the straightaways! You qualifiy! Barely..."

Sylene raised her hands, "Yes! I-WHOA!" She forgot to grab on and she crashed into the barriers. She got up, "Ooh...I'm okay."
1423121221222111111211222.title: At the Duel Academy

14231212212221111112112221.content:
It was about three days after Sylene passed the first part of the test. Yusei made some slight modifications to her runner to make it run more smoothly. She readied her deck, adding a few cards and learning new things. She practice dueled with her friends to get into the hang of things. She lost against the others, but she did hold out pretty good. That built her confidence up; if she could hold out long enough with some of the best Turbo Duelists in New Domino City, then she could easily pass the test. And Adam, he has been beside her the entire time. She was often curious on his friendship at times, but it seemed very official now.

The other runners went before her. Officer Trudge, just like Adam said, was the one to beat. Half of the students could barely make it in one draw. It seemed they only focused on the course for the first part, not experiencing to duel just the same. The only one that passed was the same who passed with flying colors before. He winked at Sylene as he went by. His handsome face was hard to not stare at, giving a flush of red to her cheeks. "Sylene Truesdale" he spoke out loud.

She became focused again and rolled her runner up, "H-Here..."

Officer Trudge gave a smirk, "Well, that's some getup you got. But Turbo Duel's aren't all about looks, you have to duel good too. And seeing how I saw you with Adam earlier doesn't impress me much."

She gave a scowl, knowing the experience she had with him earlier. She and Adam were just talking before the test, and the kind officer just had to talk with him. Adam was right, he did act like a father. But he was definitely not his father. Sylene smirked, "I'll keep that in mind Officer Trudge, I'll also keep in mind on the many times you lost in Turbo Duels against...what did you call him? "Satellite Scum?""

Trudge frowned, remembering about Yusei. The embarrassment. "You know what Truesdale, you just earned my attention. Now let's see if you got what it takes." He climbed onto his runner before putting his helmet on. As Sylene did it, she heard a few cheers from the stands. Her friends were there, and the one cheering was Crystal. She waved before putting her helmet on. The two lined up at the starting line, engines revving.

If I can just take the first turn, then I can have the first move. And I need that first move if I am going to win. As the green light lit up, Sylene's runner revved loudly. She started off much faster than Trudge. Even she was surprised by the jolt of speed. However, thanks to it, she had the first move. "It's my draw Trudge, so you better hope I draw a dud!" She looked at her hand, a decent start. I don't know what strategy Trudge has for me...but I better play it safe. Good luck out there buddy... "I summon Cycroid in ATK mode!" Sylene summons the littlest Vehicroid she had. The little bike looked cute pedaling beside her. Cycroid ATK: 800

Trudge huffed with humor, "You call that a monster?! I never knew you could ride a bike without training wheels!"

Sylene grunted a bit, and even Cycroid made a seemingly angry chime on his bell. "I end my turn with a face down."

Trudge cracked a smile, "My draw!" Both of their speed counters increased to one. "I summon Gate Blocker in Defense mode!"

In the stands, Yusei looked worried. "This is what I was afraid of..."

Back at the duel, the newly summoned monster appeared in front of Sylene. Gate Blocker DEF: 2000 She panicked and swerved a bit before getting back into things. "Hey!" she shouted, "I thought you summoned him! Why is he on my field?!"

"He's still my monster, but gate Blocker has a very handy ability" Trudge replied. "You see, when Gate Blocker is face up on the field, you cannot gain any Speed Counters during your standby phases."

Sylene was shocked, "Wait, what?!" Trudge placed two cards down before ending his turn. Sylene looked at her screen; like he said, she was still stuck at 1 as his counters were up at 2. She needed to defeat that monster before anything bad happens. She drew her next card, and she was exuberant on what it was. "Sorry Trudge, you're monster may be tricky, but its not going to stop me! I summon Drillroid in ATK mode!" The monster came from underground, and looked ready for battle. Drillroid ATK: 1600

"What's a monster like that going to do?" he asked with a sly expression.

"Nothing, except whenever Drillroid attacks a monster in Defense mode, the monster is automatically destroyed!"

"Wait...what did you just say?" Drillroid charged at Gate Blocker. He smashed straight through it, but Sylene suffered the difference in damage. Sylene: 3600 LP "Ha! That was foolish of you to do."

"Maybe..." she responded, "But now I can gain Speed Counters, and now a little buddy of mine will attack you directly! Go Cycroid!" The bike turned before pedaling hard towards Trudge, handlebars held high.

"Sorry Sylene, but you're not getting off the hook that easily. I activate my Broken Blocker Trap Card!" Trudge smirked as his card was flipped. "This allows me ti bring out two for the price of one, and now two Gate Blockers join the field!" Two of those monsters appeared, but one flew in front of Cycroid.

"Cycroid stop!" The little bike hit the brakes hard as he came to a halt. Both of them sighed in relief. The Gate Blocker went back in front of Sylene. "I end my turn with another face down."

The duel was getting upstarted, but sadly Sylene was getting nowhere. Trudge now had three Speed Counters, and she only has one. Trudge drew his card, "As much as you love my Gate Blockers, I'm getting rid of one of them to summon Handcuffs Dragon to the field!" A blocker flew past her, and disappeared in a flash. However, his new monster appeared from the same one. It roared as it spread his wings. Handcuffs Dragon ATK: 1800 "And now, Handcuffs Dragon attack Drillroid!"

Sylene was surprised as his monster too command. With a two pronged clutch, Drillroid was squeezed into pieces. Sylene: 3200 LP "Why attack Drillroid when Cycroid has less ATK points?!"

"Don't try that on me missy" Trudge replied. "If that overgrown drill of yours was still around, he could take out Gate Blocker and you would be home free. But I am not letting you escape that easily. And I mixed all of the decks I have every used, just for this soul purpose."

Sylene gulped in fear. Oh no...if I don't find a way past Gate Blocker now, I'll never get my license!
14231212212221111112112221.title: Turbo Duel License Part 1

142312122122211111121122211.content:
Sylene rounded the turn with Trudge hot on her tail. The line up was her Cycroid versus his Gate Blocker and Handcuffs Dragon. Things looked grim, but she believed in her cards. "Trudge, since you destroyed a Vehicroid monster I can activate my Supercharge Trap Card! Which allows me to draw two cards!" She drew those cards from her deck.

"Get all the cards you want, nothing can help you now" he replied.

"We'll see..." She drew her next card. She gasped at what it was. It was not Crystal's card, but another friend of hers. She completely forgot about this card. "I summon Amazon Swords Woman in ATK mode!" The monster she summon posed dramatically with her mighty weapon held high. Amazon Swords Woman ATK: 1500 "And now Amazon Swords Woman, attack Gate Blocker!" The female warrior grasped her sword and jumped to ready her attack.

"The exhaust from your runner must be affecting your brain Truesdale!" shouted Trudge. "That Amazon has 1500 ATK points! There is no way she can destroy my Gate Blocker!"

"I'm not trying to destroy your monster!"

"Then...what are you attacking for?" he asked with confusion.

"You'll see..." Amazon Swords Woman came down onto Gate Blocker, but her sword bounced off and out of her grasp. But then the sword came crashing down in front of Trudge. He dodged it, but his life points still took a hit. Trudge: 3500 LP "You see when Amazon Swords Woman is in a battle, any Battle Damage that is dealt is dealt to my opponent, and that one is you!"

He smirked, "Very clever girl, I have to hand it to you your tricky."

"I set two more cards face down. Its your turn Trudge."

Trudge drew his next card. His speed counter raised to four. He smirked, "Oh Sylene...I think you'll enjoy what I'm going to do next."

"What? Are you going to give up?" she asked.

Trudge put three cards into his graveyard, "Sorry, but I am not. By sending three monsters to the Graveyard, I can special summon Montage Dragon to the field!" Three beams of light shot out, colliding into one before his monster was unleashed. It roared at her, making Sylene very nervous. "And, since the combined levels of the monsters I sent to the Graveyard was 9, Montage Dragon has a heaping 3000 ATK points!" Montage Dragon ATK: 3000 "Get ready Sylene, because you do not want to miss the destruction of your monsters."

"Trust me Trudge...you'll regret attacking me." Her voice seemed dull, almost like she's given up.

"We'll see, Montage Dragon, destroy that stupid bicycle with Power Collage!" His dragon took aim at Cycroid. The little bike grew nervous, very nervous.

"Not so fast Trudge! I activate my face down! Shift!" As the card activated, she looked to Swords Woman. The Amazon nodded, understanding what was going to happen. "I can switch the attack target of your monster, and I choose your dragon to destroy Amazon Swords Woman!" Montage Dragon blasted his attack at her. She was destroyed, but her sword flew up once more. "And because of her special ability, the Battle Damage I would have taken becomes yours!"

Trudge was slammed by the sword once more, getting the full effect of the monster. Trudge: 2000 LP "I don't know why you're so protective of that little monster of yours, but there is nothing you can do now to win this duel. But now Handcuffs Dragon, attack Cycroid now!" His dragon flew in to clash with Cycroid. Sadly, Sylene did not have any cards. "I'm sorry..." she spoke to him before he was destroyed. Sylene: 2200 LP "Look at you" he spoke with a smile, "Two face downs, no monsters, and only 2200 Life Points left. Next turn, you're finished."

"But not yet!" This caught Trudge by surprise as a face down card was flipped. He was even more surprised by what it was. It was Slipstream, and he was all too familiar with its effects. "Now thanks to my Trap Card, I gain Speed Counters equal to yours!" Her counters increased to 4. Her runner sped up down the track. She turned the course before drawing. "And now that I have four Speed Counters, I can now activate the Speed Fusion Speed Spell!" Energy began to swirl around her. "This allows me to summon a fusion monster, and I have a special monster for your Trudge!" She looked to her hand, seeing Gyroid. he nodded in approval. "I'm going to fuse Gyroid, and Steamroid that's in my hand and summon, the ultimate engine, Steam Gyroid!" Her fusion monster came out, blades whirling. Steam Gyroid ATK: 2200 "But I am not finished, I now summon Mecha-Dog Marron!" A toy-looking robotic dog joined the field. Immediately she heard her friend Crystal's cheer. Mecha-Dog Marron ATK: 1000

"How is that card going to help you?" asked Trudge.

"I'll show you! Mecha-Dog Marron! Attack Handcuffs Dragon!" The little dog turned, rolling at Trudge's dragon barking angrily.

"Now I definitely know the exhaust if affecting your brain. You're sending that monster to its doom!" Handcuffs Dragon smashed Marron in one swift blow. Sylene: 1400 LP "And now you're even closer to defeat!"

"Now Mecha-Dog Marron's effect activates!" Sylene shouted, earning Trudge's attention. "Since he was destroyed by battle and sent to the graveyard, now both of us take 1000 points of damage!" Both duelists grunted as they were each hit with energy surges. Sylene: 400 LP Trudge: 1000 LP

"You may have dwindled my Life Points, but your Life Points took a hit too."

"And its all according to plan. Now Steam Gyroid, attack Handcuffs Dragon! Train Twister!" Her fusion monster became hidden within a swirling column of wind. The two collided, Trudge's dragon now destroyed. Trudge: 600 LP

"Not good enough Sylene..." he spoke. "Because you destroyed my monster, you now activate my Handcuffs Dragon's ability!" In a flash, the monster returned. But now, it latched onto Steam Gyroid. Her monster tried to fight against its grip. Steam Gyroid ATK: 400 "Now you're monster is finished!"

Sylene cracked a smile, "Trudge, I came this far, but I am not going down. I reveal my face down, Equip Shock!"

"WHAT?!" he shouted as it revealed. The card glowed onto her fusion monster, freeing it from Handcuffs Dragon. However, his monster now went to his side. It grabbed Montage Dragon, binding it tightly. It roared in all directions as it tried to break free. Montage Dragon ATK: 1200

"And...you know the rest of the effect of this trap. Steam Gyroid chuckled as he looked onto Montage Dragon. Steam Gyroid ATK: 2200 "Steam Gyroid, finish this!" her fusion charged, engines revved and propellers spinning. He slammed straight into Montage Dragon, destroying it. Trudge's points dropped to 0, his Duel Runner stopped. Slyene drove off in a victory lap, her friends cheering. Trudge took his helmet off, looking out to her. He smiled at her enthusiasm. I hate to admit it, but she did impress me with that deck of hers. Not a single Synchro Monster either. Sylene stopped when she passed him once more. She got off her runner, took her helmet off, and shook her hair free. "Congratulations Sylene, you have earned your Duel Runner License."

She bowed, "Thank you Officer Trudge. Now...if you would excuse me...I feel...kind of..." She suddenly fell over. She seemed very exhausted. Trudge helped her over.
142312122122211111121122211.title: Turbo Duel License Part 2

1423121221222111111211222111.content: Later, Sylene woke up in a new location, laying on a couch as she woke up to the smell of fresh food being made. Sylene slowly woke up and as she saw Adam, who was cooking in the kitchen. Sylene was very surprised as of her new surroundings, but it didnt take long for Adam to notice she was awake when he turned around, saying to her, "Evening, Sleeping Beauty. Gave me and Trudge a little scare, but it is fine. I got Trudge to tell your parents about what occurred early and that me and Yuesi were going to see if you were alright have your little moment." Sylene then looked at the room and saw that it was a very nice apartment, almost like Leo and Luna's, on the good side of New Domino City with a very good view of the city from his floor.
1423121221222111111211222111.title: Into the Dragon's Lair

14231212212221111112112221111.content:
Sylene rubbed her head, "Where...am I...?"

"You're in my apartment" Adam spoke up as he continued to cook. "I thought you deserved something nice after you received your license."

Sylene gave him a smile, "Remind me not to fall asleep next to you." She pulled out her deck, flipping over a few cards. She pulled out Gyroid, Swords Woman, and Mecha-Dog Marron. "Thanks to you three, I won my license. You will always have a special place in my deck." Gyroid winked at her, and the other monsters seemed to move as well. Sylene was shocked by this, too shocked to see someone enter.

"There's the new Duel Runner rider!" Sylene was hugged by Akiza. The two girls shared a giggle as Adam walked over. They all got settled on his couch as the meal was in the oven. Akiza looked at the two cards, "I never knew that you had these cards."

"I said before that some of my other friends gave me some of their cards to try and get me into something else" she replied. "Amazon Swords Woman was given to me by Bremusa." Akiza held back a laugh, completely aware of the name. Adam was still lost. "Uh...who is this Bremusa?"

"Bremusa is probably one of the biggest students in Duel Academy" Akiza answered. "She uses an Amazon Deck, plus she looks like she would belong on one of the cards."

His eyebrow raised, "She's really that big?"

Sylene giggled, "Well, if I remember correctly, the highest level Amazon is Amazon Queen. Bremusa would be bigger than her, by a long shot." Adam's face could be read with shock. But Sylene continued to pull some cards out. "I got a bunch of cards from my friends." She was confused as there was an extra one. She gasped at it, "WHAT?!"

"What's wrong?" Adam asked as he went beside her. His face became the same level of shock as hers. It was Montage Dragon, the same card Trudge had. There was a small note on it. I was told you like to collect cards from people you duel. Here's a small reminder of the challenges you overcame. Trudge. "I never knew Trudge had a heart..."

"That was actually my doing" Akiza spoke. "I asked Trudge for that card so she could have it. Also before the duel, we made a wager."

"What would have happened if you lost?" asked Sylene.

"Oh, forget about that." Her friends gave her questionable looks. Akiza shrugged, "I knew Sylene would win, she's my friend."

"Last time I remembered, friends don't make bets on friends." Sylene looked around, trying to find the new voice. "Hello?" she spoke out loud. Akiza and Adam looked to her. She kept looking around. "Wait...she can hear me now?" Sylene looked more, "Okay, who's in here? Its not nice to try and pull pranks on someone..."

Akiza and Adam exchanged glances before they turned back. "Sylene...no one else is in here."

"Then who-?" Suddenly the image of Gyroid appeared in front of her. "AH!" She fell back, completely surprised. Gyroid looked to her, "If I would have know you were going to react like this...I would have waited till you got home."
14231212212221111112112221111.title: Collection

142312122122211111121122211111.content:
Sylene looked very nervous and scared. "G-Gyroid?! H-How?!"

Now her friends were getting worried. Adam, however, was more curious. Akiza helped her up, "Sylene, what are you talking about?"

She shook, but pointed in front of her. "G-Gyroid! There! H-He's talking to me! Can you not hear it?"

Adam smiled, "Sounds like you can talk to Duel Spirits."

Both Akiza and Sylene looked to him. Akiza then realized, "Wait, she can hear them? Like Luna?" Sylene looked between the two with even more confusion.

"Yes, I believe she was able to before. I've seen how Gyroid reacts in battle to her, so I suspected that they had some connection a while ago. Possibly after she saved him from a fire."

Sylene finally broke through the conversation, "What are you guys talking about?! What is a Duel Spirit?!"

"Duel Spirits are believed to be the spirits of the cards we all use" Akiza explained. "Luna can hear the spirits and can even talk to other's cards. It seems you can hear them too, well, at least Gyroid for right now."

"But he doesn't even have a mouth...and he's a machine...since when is he able to talk?" "You say that like its a bad thing." Sylene looked in his direction, "Well I'm sorry if a card never talked to me!" She stopped, "Wait a minute." She looked to her other cards. Amazon Swords Woman gave her a nod, but no speech. "Does that mean...each card I have ever used has a Duel Spirit?!" Her friends nodded, causing her to worry. She looked to Gyroid, "Please tell me you guys don't hate me. I know what I did in the past, but I am doing better now!"

Gyroid stopped her, at least in Sylene's eyes. "Sylene...none of us hate you. We all like you, and we appreciate you for using us. Its been a while since then..."

Sylene smiled, "This is awesome! Now I have a second opinion on things! And now I won't be alone anymore in a duel."

Adam looked to his shoulder, "Now she knows how we feel, eh buddy?" He stopped when he smelled the air. "Oh no! I almost left it in the oven too long!" He rushed back over to the kitchen.
142312122122211111121122211111.title: Explanation

choices: Adam gets a call and steps out as the girls eat
1423121221222111111211222111111.content:
Few moments later...

Adam had the table set for three people since he did make enough for three as the girls waited and chatted in the living room and waited for Adam to finish, but was kind of distracted by the realization that now Sylene could finally speak and see her favorite duel monster come to life and brought back memories of when a few of his favorite cards started to talk to him. But Adam did not want to explain that story at the moment and said to the girls, "Dinner's ready, ladies."

Akiza and Sylene walked into the dinning room and saw the table fully set with a big bowl of Beef Stroganoff in the middle of the small table that sat four and could smell all the cooked ingredients inside the stroganoff.

Azika and Sylene didn't know what to say when they saw Adam's fine cooking and how it smelt to their noses.

Adam just said, "The advantages of seeing my mother more than my father, I got to help mom cook."

Adam then pulled out two chairs for the girls and waited for them to sit down first.
1423121221222111111211222111111.title: Dinner with Friends

choices: Azika gets a call from Yusei
14231212212221111112112221111111.content:
Adam, Azika, and Sylene began to start eating as both of Sylene's and Adam's duel spirits appeared next to each other. Azika and Sylene then noticed that Adam's duel spirit was a little blue baby dragon that was from the card Decoy Dragon, which was a weak little dragon who had such a powerful effect that could turn the tide of battle.

Adam started to eat slowly in front of the girls as they started to talk as he slowly began to listen as his eating started to slow down...
14231212212221111112112221111111.title: They begin to have dinner

choices: Blow material out, bringing two otherworldly beings to come out
Suck material in, Sylene and Adam got sucked inside
142312122122211111121122211111111.content:
Suddenly, a ring went off. Akiza looked slightly embarrassed as she pulled up her phone, "Sorry guys..." She got up and walked to another room. That just left Adam and Sylene. Adam gave her a smile, which caused her to blush and look down to her food. Gyroid's eyes rolled and his rotor spun slightly. He understood Sylene for a while, but sometimes he wished that she would just stop being so confined. Decoy Dragon could only laugh. "What? Really?!" The two humans, as well as the two Duel Spirits, looked over. "That's great Yusei! I'll be right over!"

"What's up?" asked Adam after swallowing.

"I'm not sure if you guys know, Yusei works as a researcher for New Domino research facility. He says he may have found a new power source even stronger than the Ener-D!"

"Wha-?!" Sylene had her mouth stuffed, she looked shocked. Gyroid huffed again as Adam and Decoy Dragon laughed. She wiped her mouth off, "You're not joking are you?!"

"You seem excited" Adam spoke.

"I always like new advances in technology. If the energy is more powerful than Ener-D, then New Domino could reach the next level in no time at all!"

Adam had to smile at her enthusiasm. It was nice to see her so upbeat rather than Miss Sad Sack that he knew a week ago. The trio of duelists soon set off to the research facility. Yusei met them at the entrance, dressed in a lab coat. Akiza complimented him on his looks before they went in. The facility was furthering the advances of every known thing; transportation, education, manual labor, and yes, dueling. Sylene stopped at the new Duel Runners, eyeing them with great desire. Adam had to drag her off just for them to continue.

Then, they came to Yusei's station. They stopped and admired the work. The machine was a large pillar, glowing with this strange yellow energy. "This is the containment unit" Yusei explained. "It collects and stores the energy. We discovered it while we were furthering the readings of Ener-D. It was almost like this thing is not from this world."

Adam was tapped by his Duel Spirit, who looked behind him. Sylene was now shaking; not of excitement, but of fear. "Sylene?" he asked. "You were excited before you came here."

"I just realized...this stuff is more powerful..." she gulped, "So...w-what would happen if...if the Reactor blows?"

"Do not worry Sylene" Yusei spoke. "The containment unit does not contain that much energy at this point. Right now, we're going to hook the containment unit to a small generator, seeing how this energy handles." As he spoke, a couple of men brought in what looked likea common-sized generator, used for power failures at facilities such as hospitals. They began to hook the wires in, Yusei approached the control panel. He handed each of his friends a pair of goggles, slipping his on before activating the controls. The yellow energy from inside the unit could be seen flowing down through the tube and into the generator. The generator instantly sparked to life, glowing the same yellow as the pod. At first, things seemed fine. However, a buzzer went off on the control panel. Yusei looked down, "oh no! The energy is overloading the generator! Everyone get back!"

The men around it cleared as the generator buzzed. It exploded right next to the containment unit. No one was hurt, but that was the least of their worries. The generator was placed too close, and when it exploded, it damaged the containment unit. Another buzzer went off, bring even dire news to the young scientist. The unit began to crack, "Everyone out of this room, now!" The workers began to file out, but the four duelists were left. They just reached the door before the unit burst open. The yellow energy backfiring causes some of the energy to return to its origin, causing a small portal to form. The energy output was unstable, it began to...
142312122122211111121122211111111.title: Lab Tour

choices: A duel was taking place near them
Someone stops by and challenges them to a duel
1423121221222111111211222111111112.content:
The portal began to swirl and suck, bringing anything and everything into it. The four friends held onto whatever was closest to them to prevent their escape. Yusei looked to the control pad, slowly trying to make his way over to it; making sure not to lose his grip. The force of the portal was getting stronger, pieces from the wall and ceiling began to get effected. "Hey!" Sylene heard Gyroid speak to her, "Heads up!" Sylene looked up, seeing a pipe from the air vents. It was on its last support, right overtop Yusei. It fell with a snap, the young duelist acted quickly. "Yusei watch out!" Truesdale managed to push Yusei out and prevent herself from getting crushed, but the force of the portal soon took her. She was flying straight into it, holding her eyes.

For a while, she felt herself stop turning. Sylene opened her eyes, seeing Adam hanging onto the edge of her dress. He grunted as he held onto both her and the railing. "Hang on!" Yusei called out, "I think I almost have it shut down." For a while, it was working; Sylene was not going anywhere. But, they soon began to hear the tear of fabric. Adam tried to get a better grip, but the more he moved the more her dress ripped. The gray-haired girl looked to him with sadness, "Just let me go...you'll be sucked in too..."

"That's a risk I'm willing to take!" Adam tried one last time to pull her in, but he lost his grip, and soon he went tumbling into the portal. Yusei slammed on the controls to kill the energy feed. His attempt was too late. Both duelists entered the portal just before it disappeared. Both Yusei and Akiza looked horrified at the situation.

"Yusei..." Akiza managed to say after what felt like a eternity of silence. "Where...where did they go?"

"I...I don't know" he spoke. He looked at the control panel, barely made it through the energy feedback. "They...the energy went back to where it came from. So...they...Sylene and Adam, they must have went with it."

"But...where is that?"

"I do not know..."

------------------------------------------

The two duelists groaned into consciousness in a dark alley. They sat up, rubbing their heads and other sore spots. Sylene cried a bit, "Aw...my dress...my custom made dress..."

Adam smiled, "You'll fix it..." However both her and his clothes were now damaged and torn. Their faces even have a few cuts. They would both need to get fixed up. He took the moment to look around, "Did we just...get teleported?"

The light shining down on them gave the impression that it was daytime, but nothing else. The ground they were on did not feel or look like the same as Neo Domino City. The walls of the surrounding buildings also had a different material, and a different shape. Sylene took the first few steps to the end of the alley. She gasped as she went into the light, "Adam...you need to see this."

The boy duelist followed his friend out, but he too was shocked. The city they were in, it was no longer their own city. The buildings were higher, differently shaped, and more colorful. they could see a monorail system above them as well as a few blimps. A piece of loos fabric fell from Sylene's dress, floated in the wind, and landed on the sidewalk in front of them. They were both surprised as this blue and white pod-shaped robot came to it. "TRASH IDENTIFIED." A hand reached out and took it, placing the fabric inside its body. It rolled off soon after. Sylene looked up to one of the blimps, reading what was on the panel. "Welcome to...Heartland City?!"
1423121221222111111211222111111112.title: Brought Into a Whole New World

1431.content:

I just nodded. Akiza then lead me to a garage. Why of all places would she lead me here? We soon entered the garage and saw a boy around 15, working on something. The boy then looked up and saw both of us.

info.brief_description: In your time you are 1 of the best duelests.
info.description:
During your timeline you are one of the best duelests around, but someone is out to get you so you always be careful. You could be in any of the Yu-Gi-Oh timelines with any deck in any event.


So with the rules,

1, No ending the story, (other people need a chance to write.
2, No people getting killed, (only the monsters can be destroyed)
3, I don't mind having any change to the yourself along the way, (but no one else can be altered).
4, its rare for me to delete a chapter, as long it's not extremely bad it stays safe.
5, no sex.
6, don't use made up cards.
7, have fun with this story, I will be writing too.
